texts.en: Mireille, the head of a two-person group, lives with her husband and two children, one of whom lives at home. She sells frozen products, rabbits, fins, and miscellaneous items in a local shop. To stock up, she goes to local fish markets. To satisfy the needs of her clientele, she is seeking financial help from Finadev. The funds will allow her to reinforce her business and to contribute to the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy 5 boxes of fish, 4 boxes of fins, and miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es: Fabiola de 37 años;  convive con Isaías de 41 años, fruto del gran amor que sienten tienen 02 hijos Edú de 18 años y Siomara de 10 años de edad y juntos viven en casa alquilada. Fabiola, es una mujer muy emprendedora con muchas ganas de sobre salir en la vida; es dueña de su propio negocio de una fuente de soda; donde viene trabajando 10 años. Su negocio es visitada por la gente de la localidad donde reside, pues prepara jugos de fruta, ensalada de fruta y sándwich para el consumo de la gente. Al principio le fue difícil ganarse la clientela, pero  con el tiempo logró ganarselo debido a la buena atención y el cuidado de los alimentos que prepara. Hoy disfruta de su trabajo y de los buenos ingresos económicos que le genera la venta de su negocio. Asegura que el secreto es: tener voluntad y ser creativo, vender lo que no hay, dar un buen servicio, ser cuidadoso con la limpieza y atender bien a la gente. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, agradece el apoyo financiero que le brindan para seguir con sus planes de trabajo. Asimismo agradece a su banco comunal por permitirle trabajar con ellos; en donde se compromete ser puntual con los pagos de su cuota. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará frutas y lo necesario para su fuente de soda.
texts.en:
Fabiola is 37 years old. She lives with Isaías who is 41 years old, and as the fruit of their great love they have 2 children, Edú who is 18 years old and Siomara who is 10 years old, and they live together in a rented house.

Fabiola is an enterprising woman, and her dream is to have a successful life. She is the owner of her own soda-fountain business, and she has been doing this for 10 years. Her business is visited by the neighborhood people. She prepares fruit juices, fruit salads and sandwiches for her customers to eat. At first it was difficult to establish a client base, but over time she succeeded in winning them over owing to her good customer service and with care for the food she prepared. Today she enjoys the work and her good economic income that is generated by her business sales.

She tells us that the secret is: to have willpower and be creative, selling what is lacking, giving good service, being careful of cleanliness and always serving the clients well.

This will be her first loan through MFP, and she is grateful for the financial help that allows her to continue with her business plans. She also is thankful to her communal bank for letting her work with them and she promises to be on time with her scheduled payments. With the 1000 soles she will buy fruit and the necessary items for her sold-fountain

loans.use: to buy fruit and utensils to carry-out her work at her soda-fountain

loans.name: Gloria Maricela

texts.es:
Gloria, vive en casa familiar con su esposo y su madre, ella administra su tienda de productos básicos como: arroz, frijoles, aceite, el negocio lo aprendió de su madre no tiene un horario establecido y tiene mucha experiencia. 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar más mercadería como: maíz, frijoles, papel higiénico, aceite, golosinas, a si tendrá  variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes e incrementara sus ganancias y de esa forma podrá darle lo necesario a su familia.
El sueño de Gloria tener más productos nuevos y poder tener éxito en su negocio viviendo feliz con su familia.
texts.en:
Gloria lives in her family home with her husband and mother.  She manages her general store that sells staple product such as rice, beans, and oil.  She learned the business from her mother.  She does not have a fixed schedule and she has a lot of experience.

She is asking for this loan to purchase more merchandise such as corn, beans, toilet paper, oil, and sweets, so that she can have more variety to offer her customers and increase her earnings so that she can provide her family with necessities.  

Gloria's dream is to have more new products and be successful with her business and live happily with her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans, toilet paper, oil, and sweets.

loans.name: Oscar Humberto

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su esposa y su hijo, él tiene su negocio de productos de primera necesidad en su casa y debido a la demanda de los clientes abre su tienda todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo necesita para incrementar sus productos  y comprar más mercadería como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, sopas instantáneas, café instantáneo y de esa forma podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y podrá obtener mejores ingresos.
El objetivo de Oscar es tener un negocio más grande con  variedad y tener éxito dandole lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar lives with his wife and his son.  He has a business selling staple products from his home.  Thanks to customer demand, he opens his store every day from Monday to Sunday.  

He is asking for this loan to increase his products and purchase more merchandise such as rice, beans, sugar, instant soups, and instant coffee.  He will be able to satisfy the needs of his customers and earn a better income.

Oscar's goal is to have a larger business with a variety of products and to be able to provide his family with everything they need.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, instant soups, and instant coffee.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina de 38 años; es madre soltera, vive en su propia casa, junto a sus 04 queridos hijos, quienes la inspiran para seguir trabajando arduamente para salir adelante. La actividad que realiza Marcelina es cultivar plantas, como palillo, cacao y café productos que logró trabajarlos  con mucha entrega para volverlos muy productivas. Marcelina viene trabajando sus tierras desde my pequeña y hoy es toda una conocedora de la ardua labor que se ejerce en el campo agrícola. En tiempos de cosecha y traslado de productos ella necesariamente tiene que contratar peones para apresurar su trabajo. A Marcelina le encanta su trabajo por que gracias a ello compró varios muebles para su hogar; lleva trabajando 20 años y gracias a su trabajo  adquirió dos cuadras de terreno para sembrar sus cultivos.
Marcelina solicita el crédito para incrementar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas  razón por la cual acude a los prestamos que MFP facilita y con el préstamo solicitado comprará plantas de café para aumentar la producción. Este será su crédito numero 04 con MFP, se siente muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café para poder incrementar su producción.
texts.en:
Marcelina, 36, is a single mother living in her own house with her four beloved children who inspire her to continue to work hard to get ahead.  Marcelina farms plants like palillo, cocoa beans and coffee, products that she’s managed to work with much dedication to make them very productive.  Marcelina has been working her fields since she was a little girl and today she is very knowledgeable about the hard work required in farming.  During harvesting and to transport her crops to market she must hire day laborers to quicken the work.  Marcelina loves her work because thanks to it she was able to buy furniture for her house.  She’s been working twenty years and thanks to her work was able to acquire two cuadras [unit of land measurement] of land to grow her crops on.

Marcelina requests the loan to enlarge her fields and to make them very productive.  Because of this she turns to MFP loans and will use this requested loan to buy coffee plants to increase production.

This will be MFP loan #4 and she feels very happy to know that she’ll have financial support because she’ll feel more comfortable about buying what she needs; she is willing to punctually make the scheduled installment payments.  She will use the 2000 new soles to buy coffee plants to increase production.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Zoila Del Carmen

texts.es:
Zoila, vive con sus tres hijos, los tres estudian, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, tiene 15 años de estar en el negocio, comercializando cerdos, con estas ventas ha logrado mantener su hogar y cubrir todos sus gastos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de quintales de concentrado y dos cerdos, esta compra es con la intención de mejorar la alimentación de la granja y tener suficiente alimento para un lapso de tiempo.
Ella quiere tener una granja estable, que le garantice los ingresos para su familia, brindándoles una vida más cómoda.
texts.en:
Zoila lives with her three children, all of whom go to school.  She works raising and selling pigs.  She has had her business for 15 years.  With her sales, she has been able to maintain her home and cover her expenses.

She is asking for this loan to purchase 100 pound bags of feed and two pigs.  She wants to make this purchase to improve her animal's diet and to have a sufficient amount of feed for a period of time.

She wants to have a stable farm that will guarantee an income for her family, so that she can provide them with a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase feed and two pigs.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth de 29, años, vive en su propia casa junto  de su pareja Efraín de 29 años y sus 02 queridos hijos Marco de 05 años y Jeyson de 11 años de edad a quienes desea brindarles una buena educación para que en un futuro próximo sean hombres de gran provecho. Ruth es una mujer de ardua labor, se esmera a diario por entregar lo mejor de si misma a los miembros de su casa familiar. Ella se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura donde siembra sus tierras con cultivos de café. Viene realizando esta actividad hace 8 años con mucho esmero,  por que gracias a los frutos que le brinda sus plantas, ella compró su terreno para seguir cultivando. Después  de cosechar los frutos de las plantas los lleva a los centros de acopio situados en la ciudad e San Francisco y Quimbiri donde recibe mejores precios por sus granos. En tiempo de cosechas y deshierbo de malezas tiene que contratar jornaleros para poder avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su faena programada. Ruth necesita el apoyo de la entidad financiera para llevar consigo su trabajo, tiene planeado realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas comprando abono para cuidar sus  plantas de café; es por ello que acude a los préstamos que la institución MFP facilita a las personas de bajos recursos con miras a progresar. Para el bien de su trabajo, espera contar con la misma fuerza para sacar adelante  sus sembríos y a sus hijos. Este es crédito numero 04 con MFP, por ello espera del apoyo de los financistas para poder concretar sus planes y por ende se compromete a devolver  puntualmente los pagos. En su banco comunal ocupa el cargo de presidente quien vela por el progreso de los socios. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, podrá realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas comprando abono y fertilizantes para aplicar a sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Ruth, 29 years old, lives in her own house with her partner Efraín, 29, and their two children, Marco, 5, and Jeyson, 11.  They want to provide them with a good education so that in the future, they will be successful men.  Ruth is a hardworking woman who strives every day to give the best of herself to the members of her family.  

She works in agriculture, where she plants her fields with coffee crops.  She has done this work for eight years with great care, because thanks to the fruit her plants provided, she was able to purchase her land to continue planting.  After harvesting the fruits of her plants, she brings them to the collection centers in the cities of San Fransisco and Quimbri, where she gets the best prices for her grains.  During harvest time and weeding, she has to hire day laborers in order to get the work done more quickly.  

Ruth needs the support of the financial institution to carry on her work.  She needs to maintain her crops and purchase manure to care for her coffee plants, so she came to the lending institution MFP, which helps low-income people who want to improve themselves.  For the sake of her work, she hopes to have the same drive to improve her crops and her children.  This is her fourth loan with MFP, and she hopes for the support of the lenders so that she can finalize her plans.  She promises to make her payments on time.  In her community bank, she serves as the president, who watches over the progress of the members.  

With a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles, she can maintain her plants by purchasing manure and fertilizer to apply to her crops.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Philomène

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, Philomène est responsable du groupe de deux personnes. Elle est revendeuse de divers, de produits congelés, de glaces au domicile de son époux. Dans le but d'élagir son domaine d'activité, de satisfaire sa clientèle et de maximiser ses intérêts, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Le revenu issu de ce prêt l'aidera à couvrir partiellement les charges de son foyer et à renforcer son stock.
texts.en: A married mother of four, Philomène is the head of a two-person group. She sells miscellaneous goods, frozen products, and ice cream from her husband’s house. In the goal of expanding her business, satisfying her clientele, and maximizing profits, she sought and received a micro-loan from Finadev. The loan will help her to partially cover the household expenses and reinforce her stock.

loans.use: to buy 20 couscous, 5 boxes of frozen products, 20 one-liter bottles of oil, and miscellaneous items

loans.name: Rudi Alberto

texts.es:
Rudi, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, vive con su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia, él desde hace dos años se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, este es su oficio y con el cual ha logrado mantener a su familia.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de reces, compraría dos, esto le permitirá con el préstamo realizar una buena inversión, manteniéndose en su negocio y ocupación para mejorar. El propósito de Rudi  es buscar las alternativas que sean su apoyo para crecer en la ganadería y poder ofrecer a su familia una vida confortable.
texts.en:
Rudi buys and sells livestock. He lives with his wife and his children in his own house. For two years he has been working selling and buying livestock and it is his profession and the way that he has successfully supported his family.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy cattle, he will buy two, and this will permit him to make a good investment with the money from the loan, maintaining his business and occupation for the better. Rudi is searching for other ways that he can support and grow in the livestock farming business and be able to offer his family a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy two cows

loans.name: Paula Cristina

texts.es: Paula Cristina es una joven emprendedora y luchadora que con sus 25 años de edad tiene su propio taller de confección y vende su propia línea de ropa. Con la ayuda de su pareja a construido un hogar con 2 hijos a los cuales les quiere brindar la mejor educación posible. Paula Cristina sueña con que su marca crezca y se posicione en el mercado, por lo que requiere de la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de sus prendas. Busca dejarles un gran legado a sus dos hijos con una estabilidad económica y grandes oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Paula Cristina is a young, tenacious entrepreneur who at the age of 25 has her own clothes making workshop and sells her own line of clothing.  With help from her spouse she’s built a home for her two children that she wants to provide the best possible education for.

Paula Cristina dreams with her brand growing and becoming positioned in the marketplace.  To do so, she needs to buy raw materials to make her clothing.  She aims to leave a legacy to her two children of economic stability and great opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Sulma

texts.es: Sulma, de 25 años de edad, es soltera y tiene a su pequeña hija Evelyn de 06 años. Vive en el centro poblado Limonchayocc, en una casa alquilada. A Sulma siempre le ha gustado crecer y salir adelante sobre todas las cosas; desde muy niña le empezó a gustar estar a lado de su familia ayudándole en la venta de sus frutas. Ahora ella con la visión de salir adelante, hace 01 mes se dedico a la venta de frutas, es por ello, que ella produce y comercializa sus productos como: frutas cítricas, papaya, plátano y mango cuando están en su temporada. Los lleva a vender a la ciudad de Ayacucho, para que los venda a los mayoristas a un buen precio. En el futuro piensa invertir en comprar frutas ya que en su localidad lo venden a un precio cómodo ya que así puede solventar con los gastos de su hogar en especial ofrecerle una mejor vida para su hija. Este es crédito numero 01 con MFP, de la misma manera se compromete a cumplir con sus obligaciones de pago, además apuesta a seguir en su Banco Comunal por el beneficio que tiene. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará frutas para luego llevarlas a vender a la ciudad de Ayacucho.
texts.en:
Sulma, 25, is single and has a little, 6-year-old, daughter, Evelyn.  She lives in the settlement of Limonchayocc in a rented house.  Sulma has always liked to grow and to get ahead in everything.  Since childhood she liked to be alongside her family helping them sell fruit.  

Now she started to sell fruit a month ago aiming at getting ahead herself.  This is why she produces and sells her products like citrus fruit, papaya, bananas and mangoes when they are in season.  She takes them to the city of Ayacucho to sell so that she can sell them to wholesalers for a good price.  In the future she plans to invest in the purchase of fruit since it’s sold at affordable prices in her community and she can meet household expenses and offer a better life to her daughter.

This will be MFP loan #1 and she commits to make her payment obligations; she also bets on staying in her communal bank because of the benefit it has.  She will use the 1000 new soles to buy fruit to then take to the city of Ayacucho to sell.

loans.use: to buy assorted fruit.

loans.name: Henriette

texts.fr: Agée de 31ans, Henriette est responsable du groupe de deux personnes. Mariée et mère de trois enfants, elle a un maquis-bar et s'est spécialisée dans la vente de mets africains et de boissons. Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés de la place. Pour étendre son activivé et répondre aux préoccupations de sa clientèle, elle préconise le financement d'un micro-crédit à Finadev. Elle pense maximiser son profit et scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en: Thirty-one-year-old Henriette is the head of a two-person group. A married mother of three, she has an eatery-bar and specializes in selling African dishes and beverages. She stocks up at local markets. To expand her business and satisfy her clientele, she is seeking a micro-loan from Finadev. She would like to maximize her profits and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy 5 cases of SOBEBRA drinks, 5 boxes of frozen products, vegetables, and miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Marie-Léonie Fifamey

texts.fr: Agée de 44ans , Marie-léonie est responsable du groupe de deux personnes. Elle est mariée et mère de quatre enfants et s'est spécialisée dans la vente de légumes, condiments et divers à son domicile. Dans le but de renforcer ses activités, elle a sollicité Finadev pour le renouvellement de son micro crédit afin de pouvoir répondre aux attentes de sa clientèle,accroître son bénéfice ,et participer au mieux être de sa famille.
texts.en: Forty-four-year-old Marie-léonie is the head of a two-person group. She is a married mother of four and sells vegetables, seasonings, and miscellaneous items at her home. In the goal of expanding her business, she is seeking a micro-loan renewal from Finadev in order to be able to respond to the needs of her clientele, increase her profits, and contribute to the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 baskets of tomatoes, 2 baskets of spices, vegetables, and miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teofila, de 58 años de edad, vive con su esposo Andrés y fruto de ello tienen a su hija Marisol de 16 años la cuales viene cursando la etapa escolar. Juntos residen en la localidad de Limonchayocc, donde tienen su propia casa. Hace 20 años que Teofila, a dedicado su tiempo a sus cultivos de café. Es por ello que trata de dar el mejor cuidado respectivo a sus plantaciones y bajo esa propuesta es que muchos de sus compradores se han sentido satisfechos  por la calidad de sus productos. Esto no hubiera sido posible sin la ayuda de su esposo. sin embargo en tiempos de cosecha necesita el apoyo de los peones, para que de esa manera pueda avanzar con rapidez en las extracciones de los frutos. Gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano está obteniendo buenos ingresos económicos.  Este es crédito numero 02 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de los financistas y esta dispuesta a cumplir puntualmente con el rol de sus cronogramas de pago. 
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará abono y fertilizantes para realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos ya que tiene previsto injertarlos a medida que van desarrollando.
texts.en:
Teofila is 58 years old. She lives with her husband Andrés and they have a daughter Marisol who is 16 years old and who is a school student. They live together in the town of Limonchayocc where they have their own house.

For twenty years Teofila has been dedicating her time to her coffee crops. She tries to give the best proper care to her plantations and because of this principle many of her buyers have been satisfied with the quality of her crops.

This would not have been possible without the help of her husband. All the same, in times of harvest she needs the help of laborers so that she can rapidly harvest the crop. 

Thanks to her daily efforts she is making a good profit. 

This is her second loan through MFP, and she is very happy to know that she can count once again on the support of the loaners and she is ready to make her payments promptly in accordance with the prescribed payment plan.

With the 2000 soles she will buy compost and fertilizer in order to maintain her crops and she is looking forward to grafting them as a way to develop them.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer

loans.name: Olimpia

texts.es:
Olimpia, de 29 años de edad, ella es una mujer alegre y laboriosa y esta casada con Mauth de 32 años y fruto de ello tienen 04 hijos y viven en su propia casa. Olimpia, es muy empeñosa en sus labores y con ese optimismo que tiene decidió tener su propio negocio. Desde hace 09 años vende ropa importada al gusto del cliente y lo realiza con mucha vitalidad, porque es de su agrado. Para ella es más fácil tener su negocio cerca de su casa, porque le ahorra tiempo para realizar el desayuno y el almuerzo para su familia.
Lo bueno de su negocio, es que cuenta con cantidad de clientes que llegan por si solos sabiendo que encontraran las prendas  adecuadas. El éxito de su negocio radica en el buen trato y ofrecer su mercadería a precios módicos. Con el apoyo del crédito viajará a la ciudad de lima para comprar variedad de prendas. Posteriormente para el buen ingreso de su economía piensa en incrementar mayor cantidad de ropa para venderlo en un centro comercial. Este es crédito número 10 con MFP, por lo cual se compromete a seguir pagando puntualmente sus cuotas y esta vez espera contar con el apoyo de los financistas para seguir progresando. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar mayor cantidad de ropa para incrementar su tienda.
texts.en:
Olimpia, 29, is a cheerful, hardworking woman married to Mauth, 32; they have four children and they live in their own house.  Olimpia is very dedicated to her work and with this optimism decided to have a business of her own.  For the last nine years she’s been selling imported clothing according to the taste of her customers and she does this with much energy because she enjoys it.  For her, it’s easier to have her business near her home because she saves time to prepare breakfast and lunch for her family.

What’s good about her business is that it has a good number of customers that come by on their own knowing that they will find the adequate articles of clothing.  The success of her business resides in the good service and in selling her wares at affordable prices.  With the loan’s support she will travel to the city of Lima to buy a variety of clothing.  Later on, to increase income she plans to increase the amount of clothing to sell it in a shopping center.

This will be MFP loan #10 and she commits to continue making her installment payments punctually; she hopes to have support from lenders to continue making progress.  She will use the 2000 new soles to buy larger amounts of clothes to enlarge her store.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso” es un grupo conformado por 06 socios, la cual lleva 04 meses trabajando con el Programa- Prosperidad, siendo Betzabet la que preside el grupo, ella tiene 34 años de edad, es separada y tiene 02 hijos, actualmente sigue apoyando al menor de ellos ya que está en etapa escolar. Hace  más de 04 años  que Betzabet se dedica a la venta de anticuchos, la cual los ofrece a las afueras de su hogar, gracias a su arduo trabajo a podido mejorar su calidad de vida pues hace 01 años instalo en su domicilio una tienda la cual ofrece productos de primera necesidad. Betzabet es una mujer trabajadora que tiene como anhelo terminar de construir su vivienda. En esta oportunidad solicito el crédito para invertir en su tienda comprando abarrates como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos y aceite y de esta manera llegar a fidelizar a sus clientes. La Alcancía Comunal “Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso” agradecen el crédito brindado.
texts.en:
The community bank "Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso" [Women United for Progress], is a group made up of six members who have worked with the Prosperity Program for four months.  

Betzabet is the leader of the group.  She is 34 years old, separated, and has two children.  She currently supports her younger child, who is school aged.  For more than four years, Betzabet has worked selling kebabs.  She sells them outside her house.  Thanks to her hard work, she has been able to improve her quality of life, and one year ago, she started a store in her home that sells staple products.  Betzabet is a hardworking woman whose goal is to finish building her home.  

She is asking for this loan to invest in her store by purchasing groceries such as rice, milk, pasta, and oil so that she can build a loyal customer base.  

The community bank "Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso" is very thankful for the loan being provided.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, pasta, and oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy notebooks and mobile phone recharge cards.

loans.name: Rigoberto De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Rigoberto posee una tienda en el municipio de Bello al norte de la ciudad de Medellín, con la que sostiene los gastos de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y su hijo. En la tienda vende principalmente productos de la canasta familiar, además de snack y licor. Con el ánimo de aprovechar la temporada de fin de año, donde el consumo de licor se aumenta, el señor Rigoberto requiere de la compra de mercancía para tener un inventario prudente de acuerdo al nivel de la demanda de la temporada de fin de año. Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y se consolide como un buen negocio en el sector y las ventas le permitan tener unos ingresos con los que pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y brindarle la mejor educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Rigoberto owns a store in the community of Bello north of the city of Medellín that produces income to meet household expenses for his home where he lives with his wife and son.  

He sells basic staple items in the store as well as snacks and liquor.  In hopes of taking advantage of end of year sales when liquor consumption increases Rigoberto needs to buy merchandise to have a prudent inventory of stock available in tune with end of year demand.  

His dream is that the business grows and become established as a good business in the sector and that sales will allow him to have income with which to improve his family’s quality of life and to provide a better education for his son.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Bakhtiyar

texts.en:
Bakhtiyar is 49, married, and has three children. He raises fruits and vegetables in his garden and has been doing this for the last four years. He is a very experienced farmer and has a deep knowledge of the land and how to work it. 

Bakhtiyar usually grows seasonal fruits and vegetables and sells them for a profitable price in the central bazaar. Fresh fruits and vegetables are very popular and in high demand because people like to eat them every day and consider them very healthy. Also one of the favorite national dishes, Dolma, is made of fresh eggplants, peppers, and tomatoes. Bakhtiyar's monthly income from this business is 120 AZN. This is only one source of income in his family.

Now Bakhtiyar would like to invest more capital in his business and purchase seeds and fertilizers. For this purpose he has applied for a loan of 600 AZN. He hopes this loan will improve life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Godeffroy Edgar

texts.fr: Agé de 39ans, Godeffroy est marié et père de trois enfants. Il est spécialisé dans la fabrication et la vente des savons de dentition à Cocotomey. Pour l'écoulement des savons, le client fait des dépôts au niveau des pharmacies, les supers marchés et d'autres points de vente. Dans le but de répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, il fait  recours au financement de Finadev afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce et de contribuer activement aux charges du foyer.
texts.en:
Godeffroy is married and has three children. He specializes in making and selling soap in Cocotomey. To distribute the soap, he takes it to pharmacies, supermarkets and sales outlets. 

In order to meet client demand, he is asking Finadev for a loan so he can increase his working capital and contribute to household expenses.

loans.use: buy 3 batches of oil and other items.

loans.name: Rubiel De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Rubiel a sus 53 años, se dedica a la venta de comidas desde hace diez años, cuando lo aprendió por parte de un familiar. El negocio del señor Rubiel ha tenido muy buen reconocimiento, pues atrae gran clientela gracias a la calidad de sus alimentos y el buen servicio que ofrece. Busca poder aumentar sus ventas para mejorar su calidad de vida, por lo que requiere de la compra de insumos para estar preparado para la temporada de fin de año donde las ventas aumentan considerablemente. El sueño del señor Rubiel es que su venta de comidas crezca hasta convertirse en un gran restaurante y así poder generar empleo, mejorarle la calidad de vida a las demás personas y poder tener una estabilidad económica en el resto de su vida.
texts.en:
Rubiel, 53, has been selling food for the last ten years having learned from a family member.  Rubiel’s business has been well received and attracts a good clientele thanks to the quality of the food and the good service he provides.  

He seeks to increase sales to improve his quality of life so needs to buy ingredients to be prepared for the end of year season when sales tend to increase considerably.

Rubiel’s dream is that his food sales increase until becoming a great restaurant so that he can generate jobs and improve the quality of life of other people and have economic security for the rest of his life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Fidèle Chimène

texts.fr: Fidèle,femme dynamique, est mariée et mère de trois enfants. Elle  est coiffeuse de formation et y associe la vente des chaussures, sacs, parfums et tissus. Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés environnants pour distribuer aux fonctionnaires dans les sociétés, dans les écoles et le reste est disposé dans une vitrine à son domicile. Compte tenu de son emplacement et en vue de satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle, elle a sollicité un micro-crédit à Finadev afin d'accroître son stock de marchandises et de maximiser son profit pour le bien-être de sa famille.
texts.en:
A loyal and energetic woman, this is a mother of three children. She is a hairdresser by training and includes with her business the sale of shoes, bags, perfumes, and fabrics. She purchases her supplies from surrounding markets and then distributes them to officials in companies and in schools. The rest is placed in a display window of her home. 

Taking into account her location and aiming to satisfy the needs of her customers, she is requesting a micro-loan from Finadev to increase her stock of merchandise and to maximize her profit for the sake of her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy 30 assorted fabrics, 20 of perfumes of any brand, 20 shoes of any brand, and other goods.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es: Lidia es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Renacer” grupo que está conformado por 09 socios, siendo Lidia la tesorera del grupo, cargo que ha llevado con responsabilidad. Ella tiene 64 años de edad, es casada y tiene 04 hijos independientes. Lidia se dedica a la venta de postres como gelatinas, flan, pasteles, entre otras delicias, la cual son elaborados por ella, aparte de ese negocio se dedica a la venta de  productos de belleza la cual trabaja sobre pedido que le hacen sus clientes. Lidia es una mujer empeñosa que gracias a su trabajo ha mejorado la calidad de vida de su familia. El deseo de Lidia es de seguir trabajando positivamente y de esa manera generar utilidades para su hogar. Con el fin de seguir mejorando su negocio solicito  el préstamo para la compra de insumos de sus postres como harina, leche,  huevo, manteca, azúcar y así tener que ofrecer a sus clientes. La Alcancía Comunal "Renacer"  se comprometen a seguir  trabajando bien con el Programa- Prosperidad. Adjuntamos la fotografía de la sra. Nelly.
texts.en:
Lidia is a member of the community bank "Renacer" [Rebirth], which is made up of nine members.   Lidia is the treasurer of the group, a job she has done responsibly.  She is 64 years old, married, and has four adult children.  Lidia works selling desserts such as gelatin, flan, cakes, and other delicacies, all of which she makes herself.  In addition to this business, she also works selling beauty products, which she does when her customers place an order.

Lidia is a hard-working woman who thanks to her work has improved her family's quality of life.  Lidia wants to continue working and generate income for her household.  So that she can continue improving her business, she is asking for this loan to purchase ingredients for her desserts such as flour, milk, eggs, butter, and sugar.  

The "Renacer" community bank promises to continue working well with the Prosperity Program. 

We have attached a photograph of Sra. Nelly.

loans.use: to purchase flour, milk, eggs, butter, and sugar.

loans.name: Atchi Christine

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de trois enfants, Christine vit avec son mari et a pour activité principale la vente de Cocos en gros. Elle travaille à la maison avec certains membres de sa famille.  Pour faire face aux besoins de sa clientèle qui s'accroît sans cesse, elle sollicite un micro-crédit à Finadev  en vue de maximiser son profit et de participer aux dépenses quotidiennes du foyer.
texts.en: Married and the mother of 3 children, Christine lives with her husband and for her primary business is a coconut wholeseller. To meet the demands of her clients, which never stop growing, she seeks a loan from FINADEV in order to maximize her profit and contribute to the daily expenses of her household.

loans.use: 7 lots of coconuts for resale

loans.name: Pauline

texts.fr: Relation dynamique, Pauline est mariée et mère de trois enfants. Elle a pour activité principale la fabrication et la vente de friandise pour enfant. Il s'agit entre autres des m'amuses gueules arisanales sucrées appelées au Bénin ''TOFFI au lait, councada,  etc''. Pour mieux l'arromatiser, elle y ajoute du lait de coco. Après cuisson au feu doux, elle vend le Toofi" à des grossite et à des détaillants qui les vendent dans les grands marchés et devant les écoless. Elle rassemble sa famille très souvent pour l'aider. En vue d'accroître sa productivité et  de satisfaire  la demande de sa clientèle, elle fait  recours à Finadev afin de renforcer son stock et d'en tirer d'énorme profit pour le bien- être de la famille.
texts.en: Pauline is happily married and has three children. Her main business is the creation and sale of friande. Often her family helps her in this business. With the aim to improve productivity and to satisfy her customers demands, she has turned to Finadev to strengthen her supplies and make a great profit to ensure the well-being of her family.

loans.use: 10 cartons de lait concentré,  achat de 3 sacs de coco

loans.name: Eugénie

texts.fr: Eugène est mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Elle s'est spécialisée dans la vente  de divers, boissons et céréales. Elle exerce son activité au bord de la voie pavée. Pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire et maximiser son profit , elle compte  renouveller  son micro crédit à Finadev afin d'honorer ses engagements vis-à-vis de ses clients,de maximiser son bénéfice afin de mieux participer aux charges familiales.
texts.en:
Eugénie is a married mother of four children. She specializes in selling a variety of goods, beverages, and grains. She operates her business along the paved road. 


To increase her sales and maximize her profits, she plans on renewing her micro-loan from Finadev to honor her commitments vis-à-vis her customers and to maximize her profits in order to do more to help with family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 24 sacks of rice (5 kg each), 20 boxes of canned (drinks), 15 boxes of couscous,10 sacks of corn, and other goods

loans.name: Elodie Armelle

texts.fr: Armelle vit maritalement et n'a pas encore d'enfant. Elle est vendeuse de divers, liqueurs et cannettes à son domicile. Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés environnants. Pour étendre son secteur d'activité et  satisfaire sa clientèle, elle fait recours à Finadev visant ainsi à atteindre une marge donnée, pouvant l'aider à  couvrir ses charges quotidiennes et augmenter son chiffre d'affaire.
texts.en:
Armelle (is married) and has no children yet. She is a retailer of various goods, liquor, and canned drinks out of her home. Her supplies come from surrounding markets. 

To extend her business sector and to satisfy her customers, she has turned toward Finadev thus aiming to achieve a given margin enabling her to help cover her day-to-day expenses and to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy 10 packs of canned drinks, 20 of assorted liquor, and other goods.

loans.name: Akuavi Françoise

texts.fr: Agée de 41 ans, Françoise est mariée et mère de  quatre enfants. Elle a une boutique dans laquelle elle vend des liqueurs, boissons en cannette et des céréales. Elle a sollicité un financement auprès de Finadev en vue d'accroître son stock et de maximiser son profit pour le bonheur de la famille.
texts.en: Françoise is 41 years old, married, and has four children. She owns a store in which she sells liquor, canned drinks, and cereals. She is seeking a loan with Finadev with the goal of increasing her stock and maximizing her profit for her family's happiness.

loans.use: To buy fifty 5-kg bags of rice, 20 boxes of drinks, 20 bottles of gin, and other items.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
La señorita Sandra con este quinto préstamo desea seguir realizando mejoramientos en su domicilio y este crédito lo utilizara para los enjarres y pintura del exterior de la vivienda. 
Sandra es una persona muy responsable, es soltera vive sola en su domicilio y solventa todos sus gastos, además apoya a su padre con algunos gastos cuando le es posible. 
Es empleada de una oficina desde hace ocho años.
texts.en:
Sandra wants to use this fifth loan to continue making home improvements; she will use this loan to stucco and paint the exterior of her home.  
Sandra is a very responsible person.  She’s single and lives alone.  She pays all her expenses and also helps her father with some of his expenses whenever possible.  She’s been employed in an office for the last 8 years

loans.use: to stucco and paint the exterior of her house.

loans.name: Afiavi Bricette

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Bricette est responsable du groupe de deux personnes. Elle distribue des plateaux d'oeuf dans un marché de la place et à d'autres bonnes dames de son quartier. Dans le but de satisfaire davantage sa clientèle, elle a sollicite et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev afin de réaliser des bénéfices plus consistants et de diversifier son activité, de mieux participer aux dépenses et aux mieux être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Bricette est responsable du groupe de deux personnes. Elle distribue des plateaux d'oeuf dans un marché de la place et à d'autres bonnes dames de son quartier. Dans le but de satisfaire davantage sa clientèle, elle a sollicite et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev afin de réaliser des bénéfices plus consistants et de diversifier son activité, de mieux participer aux dépenses et aux mieux être de sa famille.

Married and the mother of two children, Bricette is the leader of the two-person group.  She distributes egg trays in the local market and to other women in her neighborhood.  With the goal of better satisfying her customers, she requested and obtained a micro-loan from Finadev.  She wants to make a more consistent profit and to diversify her business so she can help out more with the household expenses and an improved standard of living for her family.

loans.use: buy 20 egg trays

loans.name: Abigail Group

texts.es:
Este  grupo se  llama  Abigail , esta  conformado por  doce integrantes , trabajadores empleados y comerciantes con deseos de superarse  y triunfar en el futuro.
Todos los integrantes de este grupo trabajan en una tienda comercial  Gazher y también cuentan con un pequeño negocio  propio cada uno.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la señorita Guadalupe quien se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace tres años.
Ellas nos cuenta que le  gusta mucho su trabajo y su negocio ya que le deja buenas ganancias  y puede tener un dinero extra para cualquier emergencia.
Lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es que puede administrar su tiempo ya que  trabaja en la tienda Gazher de auxiliar de administración  en la mañana y en las tardes se dedica a atender su local de ropa.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la comprar  de mas ropa , para dama y niños ya que sus compañeras de grupo la ayudan a vender en la tienda donde trabajan vende ropa por catalogo .
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Minerva- quien se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Dulce – quien se dedica a la venta de zapatos.
Isacc- quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos.
Adelina Adela- quien se dedica a la venta de zapatos.
Guadalupe Lucia- quien se dedica a la venta de comida.
Ivett- quien se dedica a la venta de agua potable
Tomasa quien se dedica a la venta de abarrotes.
Florentino – quien se dedica a la venta de abarrotes.
Elizabeth- quien se dedica a la venta de abarrotes.
María Dolores- quien se dedica a la venta de abarrotes.
Marcelina- quien se dedica  a la venta de ropa.

Le dan las gracias a fundación por todo el apoyo que le ha dado para seguir adelante y triunfar en el futuro  y hacer crecer sus negocios.
texts.en:
This group is called Abigail.  It has 12 members, employees and business owners who want to get ahead and triumph in the future. All of the members of this group work at a store, Gazher, and also have their own small businesses.  

One of the members of the group is Guadalupe, who has been selling clothing for 3 years.  She tells us that she likes her job and her business very much since they provide good earnings and she can make a little extra money for emergencies.  What she likes best about her business is that she can manage her own time.  She works at the Gazher store as an administrative assistant in the morning, and in the afternoons she takes care of her clothing shop.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more clothing for women and children. The other women in the group help her sell in the store where they work and by catalog. 

The other group members are:
Minerva - who sells perfume.
Dulce - who sells shoes.
Isacc - who sells snacks.
Adelina Adela - who sells shoes. 
Guadalupe Lucia - who sells meals.
Ivett - who sells drinking water.
Tomasa -who sells general merchandise.
Florentino - who sells general merchandise.  
Elizabeth- who sells general merchandise.
María Dolores- who sells general merchandise.
Marcelina- who sells clothing.

They thank the foundation for all of the support it has provided so they can continue to get ahead, be successful in the future, and grow their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for sale.

loans.name: Flor Del Rio Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Flor del rio esta integrado por 11 personas cada una de ellas con una actividad economica. Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en una comunidad en la cual su gente es muy trabajadora, alegre y amable y el clima es cálido ya que en los alrededores del pueblo hay muchas huleras(arboles de hule) de los que se extrae la resina y muchos de los habitantes de esta comunidad se dedican a esta actividad.

El señor Vicente es uno de los miembros de este grupo, el tiene la edad de 52 años, es casado y solo estudio hasta el segundo grado de primaria porque sus padres no tenían los recursos para darle mas estudios. El dice que su padre siempre le dijo que aunque no estudio tenia que aprender a trabajar un oficio para ganarse la vida y aprendio el oficio de carnicero y desde hace 20 años abrio su propio negocio y de ahi a sacado a delante a su familia. El realiza sus ventas los fines(Viernes, sabado y domingo) pero el trabajo inicia desde el jueves ya que tiene que alinear a su cerdo o vaca para al otro dia poner su venta, cuando el mata cerdo no solo vende carne sino tambien carnitas, chicharrones, longaniza y tacos para aprovechar y ganarle un poco mas.
el platica que se vende muy bien ya que es la unica carniceria de la comunidad. Don vicente invertira este credito en la compra de cerdos y vaca para poder realizar sus ventas. El desea que con esta inversion su negocio prosére ya que desea agrandar su local y dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

esta grupo en via un saludo a las érsonas que hacen posible estos creditos y agradecen el apoyo que le estan brindando.

los demas integrantes del grupo son:

Guadalupe venta de refrescos
federico venta de abarrotes
Maria de los Angeles venta de ropa 
Aide venta de dulces
Felipa venta de antojitos mexicanos
Gabriela taller de costura 
Agustin venta de refrescos 
Eusebia venta de antojitos mexicanos 
anastacio venta de refrescos
Elia venta de antojitos mexicanos
texts.en:
The Flor Del Rio (Flower of the River) group is made of 11 persons, each one of whom has a business. The group is located in a community in which people are very hardworking, happy, and friendly. The climate is warm and there are many rubber trees around the town from which the sap can be extracted. Many of the community’s inhabitants engage in this activity.

Señor Vicente is one of the members of this group. He is 52 years old and married. He studied only until the second grade of primary school because his parents didn’t have the resources to give him more education. He says that his father always told him that, although he didn’t have schooling, he had to learn to work at a trade in order to earn a livelihood. He learned the trade of butcher. Twenty years ago he opened his own business and from this his family got ahead. He carries out his sales on the weekends (Friday, Saturday, and Sunday), but his work begins on Thursday since he has to arrange for the pigs and cow to put on sale the other days. When he slaughters a pig, he doesn’t only sell the meat, but rather carnitas (roasted pork), chicarrones (pork rinds), chorizo, and tacos to make good use of the meat and earn a little more. These dishes sell very well since his is the only meat market in the community.

Don Vicente will invest this loan in the purchase of pigs and a cow in order to be able to carry out his sales. He wants his business to prosper with this investment since he wants to enlarge his shop and give his family a better quality of life. The group sends a greeting to the people who make these loans possible. They are thankful for the support which is being offered. The remaining members of the group are:

Guadalupe, sale of soft drinks Frederico, sale of groceries Maria de los Angeles, clothing sales Aide, sale of sweets Felipa, sale of Mexican snacks Gabriela, sewing workshop Agustin, soft drink sales Eusebia, sale of Mexican snacks Anastacio, soft drink sales Elia, sale of Mexican snacks

loans.use: to purchase pigs and a cow

loans.name: Mario De Jesus

texts.es: Mario de Jesús su actividad económica  a la que se dedica es a una carpintería en cual tiene experiencia en el negocio, es un emprender que es un ejemplo para su familia ya que el mismo se abrió puertas para buscar los ingresos de la familia. Fundación León 2000, le apoyo con el crédito para que invirtiera en su negocio, en el cual nos expresa que gracias al apoyo ha salido adelante y que hoy en día sea cumplido su sueño de tener su propio negocio. Actualmente Mario está solicitando crédito para invertir en materia prima para el negocio ya tiene los pedidos de sus clientes en cual necesita dinero para poder abastecerse.
texts.en: Mario de Jesús makes his living as a carpenter. He has experience in this business. He is an entrepreneur who is an example for his family because he has opened doors to find income for his family. Fundación León 2000 supported him with a loan to invest in his business. Mario says that thanks to the support, he has been able to survive and now his dream of having his own store has come true. Currently Mario is requesting a loan to invest in raw materials for the business. He has requests from his customers and needs money to stock the business.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials.

loans.name: Guadalupe De Reyes Group

texts.es:
Este grupo integrado por 10 personas cada una de ellas con una diferente actividad economica, este grupo se caracteriza por ser muy unido, alegre y su gante es muy trabajadora.

El señor Juaquin es otro de los integrantes de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 38 años, estudio hasta el tercer grado de secundaria y esta casado con la señora silvia, ellos tienen dos hijos los cuales asisten a  la primaria. Don Juaquin dice que como no tubo la oportunidad de estudiar aprendio el oficio de herrero para poder sacar a delante a  su familia y darle una mejor calidad de vida. El desde hace un poco mas de cuatro años puso una pequeña herreria en el patio de su casa en la cual realiza trabajos como puertas, ventanas y protecines, el trabaja sobre pedidos como ya tiene varios años con su negocio ya tiene muchos clientes y dice "Gracias a Dios siempre hay trabajo asi a hecharle ganas porque uno se recomiendo con su trabajo", el invertira este credito en la compra de material para la elaboracion de puertas, ventanas y protecciones.

el espera que con esta inversion su negocio de mejores resultado y tener mas clientes para que las ganancias aumenten y asi poder dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y poder darles la oportunidad de tener una carrera.

los demas integrantes son

Crecencia-abarrotes 
Deodora-ropa 
joel abarrotes
Arturo-carpinteria
Alberta-antojitos mexicanos
Rosa-venta de antojitos
juana venta de cosmeticos 
amelia venta de pollo
rosalia venta de antojitos mexicanos
texts.en:
This group is comprised of ten people, and each one of them has a different business activity.  This group is known for being very united, happy, and hard-working.

Juaquin, age 38, is one of the members of this group.  He attended school until the third year of secondary school.  He is married to Silvia, and they have two children who go to elementary school.  Juaquin says that as he did not have the opportunity to study, he learned the trade of being a blacksmith.  He did this in order to get his family ahead and to give them a better quality of life.

A little more than four years ago he set up a small blacksmith business on the patio of his house.  He does jobs there like doors, windows, and protections.  He works by orders because he has had his business for several years, and he has a lot of customers.

He says, “Thank God there is always work to jump into wholeheartedly because one is recommended by their work.”

He will use the loan to buy material to make the doors, windows, and protections.  He hopes that with this investment his business will have better results, and he will have more customers.  Then his earnings will increase, and he will be able to give his children a better quality of life.  He will also be able to give then the opportunity to have a career.

The other members are:

Crecencia-Groceries
Deodora-Clothes
Joel-Groceries
Arturo-Carpentry
Alberta-Mexican snacks
Rosa-Sells snacks
Juana-Sells cosmetics
Amelia-Sells chicken
Rosalia-Sells Mexican snacks

loans.use: to buy a solderer and sheeting.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco, administra un taller de mecánica automotriz, vive con su esposa y su hijo de trece años de edad, la casa es propia, desde hace 15 está dedicado al taller, del cual ha logrado cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de herramientas de trabajo y algunos repuestos para mantener el taller en buenas condiciones, mejorando la atención a los clientes.
La aspiración de Francisco es mejorar la atención a los clientes en el taller, también en su familia poder brindarles lo necesario.
texts.en:
Francisco runs an auto mechanic shop.  He lives with his wife and his 13 year old son in a home that he owns.  He has had the business for 15 years and has been able to meet his family's needs.  He is requesting a loan to purchase work tools and some replacement parts to keep the shop in good shape, thus providing better service to his customers. 

Francisco's goal is to provide better customer service at the shop and to provide his family with what they need.

loans.use: to purchase tools and replacement parts for his shop.

loans.name: La Flor Group

texts.es:
Las nuevas integrantes del grupo son señora Leonor Celicia va a comprar con su prestamo blusas, faldas, sueteres, pantalones y pants, la señora Candida va a comprar cacahuate por carga, el resto de las integrantes desarrollan la actividad que vienen desempeñando. La señora Leonor Cecilia tiene 54 años de edad, ella es casada su esposo vende yogurt, ellos tiene 4 hijos 2 hombres y 2 mujeres, todos mayores de edad 3 casados y un varón soltero, ella vende ropa, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar suéteres, pants, blusas, faldas, chamarra de caballero y pantalones de dama, caballeros y niños, calcetas, ropa interior, ella inicio su negocio hace 15 años por necesidad para apoyar a la familia ya que sus hijos estaban estudiando y los gastos eran fuertes, ella inicio vendiendo ropa interior, le hacían pedidos de faldas, trabajaba por pedido ya que manejaba poco efectivo, fue creciendo y fue ahorrando para seguir invirtiendo en mercancía y ahora ya esta mas grande su negocio sale 2 veces a la semana al centro de su comunidad a vender su ropa los martes y los viernes. Su negocio es importante porque de ahí viven, conocen a las personas y son su propio patrón, a ella le gusta vender atender bien a sus clientes para que regresen a comprar le ayuda su esposo le ayuda a poner el puesto y un nuera a atender a los clientes. Ella se siente orgullosa de poder ayudar a sus hijos y nietos le puede regalar una chamarra o pantalones. Su negocio es conocido por el buen precio y les trae a sus clientes sus pedidos lo que a ellos les gusta o que está de moda y les da la oportunidad de pagar en pagos. Sus sueños y esperanzas son viajar a España para visitar a su hija. Ella se siete feliz con este préstamo por la oportunidad que le dan de ampliar su negocio y tenerlo bien surtido. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “muchas gracias por apoyarnos, así muchas familias están trabajando sin muchas presiones económicas y nos ayudan a vivir mejor”.

**EN LA FOTO APARECE LA SEÑORA MARIA TERESA, QUIEN ESTUVO EN EL PRÉSTAMO ANTERIOR Y ÉSTA VEZ DECIDIO NO TOMAR EL PRESTAMO**
texts.en:
The new members of the group are Leonor Cecilia who is going to use her loan to buy blouses, skirts, sweaters, and pants and underwear, and Candida, who is going to buy peanuts wholesale.  The rest of the members are still doing their previous activities.  

Leonor Cecilia is 54 years old. She is married and her husband sells yogurt. They have 4 children, 2 boys and 2 girls, who are all adults.  Three of them are married and one son is single. 

Leonor Cecilia sells clothing.  She is requesting this loan to purchase sweaters, pants, blouses, skirts, men's jackets, pants for men, women and children, and underwear.  She started her business 15 years ago when she needed to support her family since her children were in school and expenses were high. She started off selling underwear. Then people requested skirts.  She worked by the order since she didn't have much cash.  The business grew and she saved money to invest in her merchandise and now her business is bigger.  Twice a week she goes to the center of her community to sell clothing on Tuesdays and Fridays.  Her business is important because they live off it, they meet people, and she is her own boss.  She likes to sell and provide good service to her customers so that they return.  Her husband helps her set up her stand and a daughter in law helps attend to customers.  She feels proud to be able to help her children and grandchildren. She can give them a jacket or pants as a gift. 

Her business is known for good prices. She provides her customers with the items that they like or what is in style, and she lets them pay in installments. She is happy with this loan for the opportunity it provides to expand her business and have it well-stocked.  The members of the group want to tell Kiva and Fundación Realidad "thank you very much for supporting us. In this way many families are working without as much economic pressure and it helps improve our lives".  


**Maria Teresa, who was part of the prior loan, appears in the picture but decided not to be part of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase sweaters, pants, blouses, skirts, men's jackets, pants for women, men, and children, and underwear.

loans.name: Los Tulipanes Blancos Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Los Tulipanes Blancos, está integrado por la señora Marcela va a comprar con su préstamo carnes, verduras, platos, aceite y refrescos, el señor Gersom va a comprar calcetines por mayoreo, la señora María Cleotilde va a comprar vitaminas, jarabe, pomadas, tés, complejos, shampoo, la señora Fausta va a comprar resistol para suelas, pampas, adornos para elaborar zapatos, la señora Gudelia va a comprar libretas, regalos, hojas, lapiceros, artículos navideños, etc. El señor Gersom tiene 27 años de edad, el es soltero, el vende ropa, el solicito su préstamo para comprar camisas, pantalones, playeras, calcetines para dama, caballero y niños, el acaba de iniciar su negocio con unos ahorros, su negocio es importante por las ganancias que obtiene, a él le gusta su trabajo le sirve de distracción y le gusta atender a sus clientes amablemente, la ganancias las utiliza para volver a comprar mercancía, el está planeando ampliar su negocio comprar más ropa, nuevas modas y lo piensa lograr trabajando, poniendo empeño al trabajo y con el préstamo que va a recibir, el vive con sus padres, hermanos y sobrinos, sus sueños y esperanzas son que progrese y crezca su negocio. Los integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “muchas gracias por su ayuda, que nos sigan apoyando con sus préstamos para que nuestros negocios crezcan”.
texts.en:
This group is called the White Tulips and was formed by Mrs. Marcela. With her loan money, she will buy meat, vegetables, dishes, oils, and soft drinks. Mr. Gersom will buy socks in bulk, and Mrs. María Cleotilde is going to buy vitamins, cough syrup, ointments, tea, and shampoo. Mrs. Fausta will buy glue for shoes and decorations for making shoes. Mrs. Gudelia will buy notebooks, gifts, paper, pens, Christmas items, and more.

Mr. Gersom is 27 years old, single, and works selling clothing. He is asking for a loan to buy shirts, pants, t-shirts, and socks for men, women, and children. He just started his business with some savings, and his business is important because of the income he can earn. He likes his job because it entertains him and he likes to very kindly attend to his customers. He uses his earnings to buy more merchandise and is planning to expand his business by buying more clothing of the latest style. He plans to accomplish this by working hard and with the loan he will receive. He lives with his parents, siblings, nieces, and nephews. His dreams and goals are to progress and grow his business. To Kiva and the Fundación Realidad, the group wants to say: "thanks a lot for your help, and for continuing to support us with your loans so that our businesses grow."

loans.use: buy shirts, pants, t-shirt, and socks for men, women, and children

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to make and sell desserts.

loans.name: El Polvorin Group

texts.es: Catalina es parte del grupo “El Polvorín” dice que le pusieron ese nombre al grupo por que la colonia donde se reúnen a hacer sus pagos se llama así. Ella tiene 27 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora y es soltera y que día a día lucha por salir adelante con sus papas ya que ella es el sostén principal de su casa. Desde hace más de 6 años se dedica a la venta de frutas de temporada como guayabas, cañas, chiles, jitomates, tomate verde, manzanas, fresas, naranjas, mandarinas, tejocotes etc. Ella surte sus frutas y legumbres en la central de abastos de su población y va a venderlas en  el mercado de la población, uno de sus sueños es poner un negocio estable en su casa para así estar más al pendiente de sus papas dice que eso la alegraría mucho. Cata como de cariño le dicen está pidiendo un crédito para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y más porque en época de diciembre tiene ventas altas debido a que la gente hace una bebida especial a base de frutas llamada ponche y la cual se da en las posadas y en las fiestas navideñas. Dice que ella está muy agradecida con la financiera ya que van varios créditos que le hacen y poco a poco su negocio va creciendo y espera pronto realizar sus sueños. Las otras nueve integrantes del grupo se llaman Maricela, María Guadalupe, María Victoria, Diana Martina, Rosa María, María Isabel, Adela, Ana Luisa e Ygnacia todas ellas invertirán sus créditos para tienda de abarrotes, tienda de ropa, bordado de prendas artesanales, puesto de dulces, venta de frutas y legumbres de temporada, zapatos por catalogo.
texts.en:
Catalina a member of the communal bank "El Polvorín."  She says that the group adopted this name because it is the name of the neighborhood where the group meets to make their payments.  Catalina is 27 years old and single. She is a hardworking woman who struggles each day to provide for her parents, because she is the main source of support for the household.  She has had a business selling seasonal produce such as: guava, sugarcane, chilies, tomatoes, green tomatoes, apples, strawberries, oranges, tangerines, and Mexican hawthorns (sour plums) for more than 6 years.  She stocks up on her fruits and vegetables from the wholesale center in her town, and she goes to sell them in the local market.  One of her dreams is to set up a stable business in her house, so that she could look after her parents.  She says that this would make her very happy. Cata, as she is affectionately called, is asking for a loan so that she can continue to invest in her business, and also because during the month of December the sales are high due to the fact that in this season people make a special drink out of fruit, called ponche, which is given out in the Christmas processions and parties.  She says that she is very grateful for the access to credit, because with the loans that she has already taken she has gradually been able to make her business grow, and she hopes to very soon make her dreams a reality.  

The other 9 members of this group are:  Maricela, María Guadalupe, María Victoria, Diana Martina, Rosa María, María Isabel, Adela, Ana Luisa and Ygnacia.  They will be investing their loans in the following types of businesses: grocery stores, clothing stores, embroidery businesses, sweet stands, businesses selling shoes through a catalog and fruit and vegetable sales.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Santa Lucia  sus integrantes decidieron ponerle  así por que les parece un nombre bonito y lleno de vida como todas ellas.
Este grupo esta  conformado por  once integrantes todos trabajadores y con deseos de  hacer mas grandes sus negocios  y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
La representante de el grupo es la profesora Odilia una persona amable trabajadora  que se dedica a la venta de leche, calabaza  y quesos .
Ella nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es  exprimir la cuajada y salir a vender sus quesos  en  las calles de su comunidad.
Esta felizmente  casada con el señor Carmelo de  de cincuenta y dos años de edad ,con quien tiene  dos hijos una mujer Andrea y un hombre Jonás quienes la ayudan a ordeñar y a moler la cuajada para la elaboración de quesos.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar mas picheles y aros para quesos  y bandejas para echar la leche.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Berenice- quien se dedica a la venta de  perfumes.
Andrés- quien se dedica  a la venta de servicio para banquetes.
María Reina- quien se dedica a la venta de  quesos
Cenobia- quien se dedica a la venta de ganado.
Gregoria- quien se dedica a la venta de  materias primas.
Remedios- quien se dedica a la venta de pan.
Jorgina- quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Xochil- quien se dedica a la venta  de costura.
Martha Felisia- quien se dedica a la venta de abarrotes
Eduardo- quien se dedica a la venta de chiles y semillas
Le dan las gracias a fundación por darles  la oportunidad de crecer  como personas y como comerciantes  ya que son personas pobres con deseos de superarse.
texts.en:
This group is called Santa Lucia. Its members decided to call it such because to them it seems like a beautiful name and full of life like them. It is made up of eleven members who are all hardworking, desire to grow their businesses, and have a better quality of life.

The representative of the group is Odilia, a nice, hardworking person who makes a living selling milk, pumpkin, and cheeses. She tells us that what she likes most about her business is squeezing the curd and going out to sell her cheeses in the streets of her community. She is happily married to Carmelo who's fifty-two years old and with whom she has two children: Andrea, a woman, and Jonás, a man. They help her milk and mash the curd to make cheese. She requested the loan to buy more jugs and hoops for cheese and trays to put milk.

The other members of the group are:

Berenice - who makes a living selling perfumes.
Andrés - who makes a living selling banquet services.
María Reina - who makes a living selling cheeses.
Cenobia - who makes a living selling livestock.
Gregoria - who makes a living selling ingredients.
Remedios - who makes a living selling bread.
Jorgina - who makes a living selling Mexican appetizers.
Xochil - who makes a living selling sewing services.
Martha Felisia - who makes a living selling groceries.
Eduardo - who makes a living chilies and seeds.


They give thanks to the foundation for giving them the opportunity to grow as people and as merchants since they are poor people with a desire to better themselves.

loans.use: to buy jugs and hoops for making cheeses.

loans.name: Luz De La Esperanza Group

texts.es: Sindy es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Luz de la Esperanza” la cual está conformado por 08 socios entusiastas comprometidos con el Programa- Prosperidad. Sindy es una joven de 23 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, aún dependientes.  Con los deseos de superarse Sindy empezó a estudiar la carrera técnica de  cosmetología,  es así como  inicia su propio  negocio,  pues actualmente cuenta con un salon de belleza donde brinda sus servicios de pintado de cabello, tratamientos capilares y cortes, este negocio le ha permitido ayudar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. El  deseo de Sindy es de comprar su propio local, ya que por el momento solo lo alquila. Ella solicito el crédito a Edaprospo  para la compra de tintes, peines, tijeras y ropas para sus hijos. La Alcancía Comunal “Luz de la Esperanza” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hacen posible su progreso.  Adjuntamos la fotografía de Dademia.
texts.en:
Sindy is a member of the Alcancía Communal Bank called Light of Hope which has eight enthusiastic members committed to the Prosperity Program.

Sindy is a young, 23 year old woman, living in a common-law marriage, and she has two children who are dependent on her. 

With the goal to succeed, Sindy began to study to be a cosmetologist, and this is how she began her own business. Currently she has a beauty salon where she offers her services of hair coloring, hair treatments and cuts. This business has permitted her to help her partner with the household expenses. Sindy’s dream is to buy her own facility, as at the moment she is renting. She is asking for a loan from Edaprospo in order to buy dyes, combs, scissors, and clothing for her children. 

The Alcancía Communal Bank Light of Hope is grateful for the loans you provide that make their progress possible. 

Attached to the group photograph, is a picture of Dademia.

loans.use: to buy dyes, combs, scissors and clothes

loans.name: El Penjamo Group

texts.es:
Elsa cuenta con 54 años de edad es casada su esposo se llama Gilberto es campesino tiene una nieta con ella la cual esta estudiando la primaria se llama Maria karleth.
Ella es comerciante vende verduras y legumbres lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de las verduras como son chile. Jitomate, papas, etc. ya tiene 4 años con el negocio y dice que  le va muy bien con su negocio y espera que le ayude ya que quisiera incrementar su negocio.

Elsa pertenece al grupo penjamo que esta integrado por 10 personas las cuales todas son mujeres continuación serán mencionadas: Nelida, Antonia, Maria, Orfelia, Ana, Verónica, Beatriz, Fulgencia, Ma Félix todas realizan una actividad comercial como la venta de ropa, comida, verduras, abarrotes, perfumes, dulces, etc.
texts.en:
Elsa is 54 years old and married.  Her husband, Gilberto, is a farmworker.  He has a granddaughter with her who is in elementary school; her name is María Karleth.

Elsa is a shopkeeper.  She sells vegetables and legumes, so she will invest her loan in buying vegetables such as chiles, tomatoes, potatoes, etc.  She has had the business for four years already and she says that it is going very well for her.  She hopes you will help her because she would like to increase her business.

Elsa belongs to the Penjamo group, which is made up of 10 people, all of them women mentioned here: Nélida, Antonia, María, Orfedelia, Ana, Verónica, Beatriz, Fulgencia, María Félix.  All of them carry out a business activity such as selling clothing, food, vegetables, groceries, perfume, sweets, etc.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as chiles, tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, etc.

loans.name: Adela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Adela, vive con una cuñada y sus hijos, ella administra una tienda de productos domésticos, la cual tiene en su vivienda, la atiende a tiempo completo, 
Actualmente esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para la tienda como arroz, azúcar, aceite, pastas, salsas, galletas, dulces, entre otros productos para surtir la tienda y ofrecer a los clientes nuevos productos.
El objetivo de Adela es mantener la tienda con todo lo necesario para los clientes, poder a través de los prestamos mejorar la disponibilidad  para que sus ventas sean mejores.
texts.en:
Adela lives with a sister-in-law and her children.  She runs a store of household necessities in her home.  She takes care of the store full time.

Currently she is requesting a loan to buy products for the store such as rice, sugar, oil, pasta, sauces, cookies, sweets, and other products, to stock the store and offer her customers new products.

Adela's goal is to keep the store with everything that is necessary for the customers and to improve availability with the loan so her sales will be better.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, pasta, sauces, cookies, and sweets.

loans.name: Wilbert

texts.es: Wilbert de 34 años de edad, es un hombre emprendedor vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Ruth de 28 años y fruto de ello tienen 02 hijos, Anali de 10 y Edison de 04 años; a quienes desea ofrecerle una buena educación. Wilbert, es un hombre profesional, con mucho sacrificio logró terminar su carrera es técnico en Computación y reparación de computadoras, agradece al apoyo brindado de sus padres quienes se esforzaron por mantener los gastos de estudio. Hace 06 años que egreso de su casa de estudios y hoy pone todo sus conocimientos adquiridos en su puesto de servicios donde brinda mantenimiento de computadoras, configuración y cableado de redes. Su ingreso le es muy favorable porque gracias a ello esta creciendo y de a pocos va implementando su tienda. Wilbert necesita el apoyo crediticio para seguir surgiendo y prosperar con su negocio con el apoyo del crédito comprará monitores, estabilizadores, cables de red. Para el bien de sus ingresos posteriormente piensa en comprar un auto para también poder trabajar ya que necesita una economía para solventar en los gastos de su familia. Este es crédito numero 05 con MFP, por ende necesita el apoyo de los financistas para seguir creciendo. En su banco comunal es una socio muy participe y muy colaborativo. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar un auto para que pueda trabajar dando el servicio de transporte y así tener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Wilbert, 34, is an entrepreneur who lives in his own home with his common-law wife, Ruth, 28, and their two children, Anali,10, and Edison, 4, who they want to receive a good education.  Wilbert is a professional who with much sacrifice was able to get a degree in computer science and technical repair.  He is grateful for his parent's support since they made every effort to cover the cost of his education.

Six years ago he finished his studies and now he has a business offering computer maintenance, configuration and network cabling services.  His income is good and has allowed him to grow and set up his shop little by little.  Wilbert is in need of a loan to keep growing and prosper, and to be able to buy monitors, stabilizers, and network cables.  He plans to use part of his earnings later to buy a car to start a transport business which will help resolve family expenses.  This is his fifth loan through MFP and he depends on the lenders to help him grow.  In his communal bank he is an active member and very collaborative.  He plans to use the 3,000 PEN loan to buy a car and run a taxi service to earn more income.

loans.use: To help pay for a car.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es: Yovana, de 25 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y trabajadora. Vive en casa alquilada junto a su pareja John de 30 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Yovana trata de luchar contra las  adversidades del destino y  olvidar la inestabilidad familiar que aqueja su hogar. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer con carácter y muy competitiva en el negocio, a pesar de que tuvo percances en el camino, supo sobresalir del mal momento. Desde hace 07 años que trabaja de forma independiente, es mas agradece a Dios, por darle esa oportunidad de mostrarse  ante sus demás competencias, desde luego que hoy tiene un puesto, donde vende ropas para todo el público en general, en efecto reconoce que lo esta beneficiando de forma positiva, ya que sus ventas aumentaron con el transcurrir del tiempo, la clave de su éxito, radica en la calidad y el precio de su producto. Ella es consciente de que le falta mucho por escalar y por ello que recurre a los préstamos para seguir surgiendo y abastecerse de mercaderías. Con el tiempo piensa alquilar un espacio en las galerías para poder vender con mayor rapidez y así exhibir toda la ropa hacia el publico, según lo gustos y preferencias. Este es crédito número 13 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de los financistas para seguir creciendo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy jovial y pone la chispa para salir del aburrimiento. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar mayor cantidad de ropa para poder incrementar en su tienda.
texts.en:
Yovana, 25, is a charismatic, hard-working woman who lives in a rented house with her common-law husband, John, 30, and their three beloved children to whom they want to give the best quality of life.  Yovana tries to struggle against the adversities of fate and forget the family instability that affects her home.  She is a woman with character and a competitive attitude in business.  Although she has had some setbacks along the way, she has always known how to overcome a bad moment.  For seven years she has been working independently.  She is thankful to have the opportunity to show what she is capable of, and now has a stand where she sells clothing to the public in general.  She claims this is very positive for her since sales have increased over time.  The key to her success is the quality and price of her products.

She is conscious of the fact that she has a long road ahead of her so she is requesting a loan to be able to keep an inventory of merchandise.  In the future she wants to rent a space at the shopping center so she can sell more quickly and exhibit all the clothing for the public to see.  This is her 13th loan through MFP.  She is happy to know that she can count on another loan to continue growing.  She is a very cheerful member of her communal bank and always adds a note of humor to any dull moment.
