In addition, he knows that Peru is known for having the most delicious food in the world and one of the dishes that Walter likes is "Pure de Papas" (mashed potatoes). Walter studied up to the fifth year of high school but he would have liked to study journalism. Walter lives with his partner. His spouse is dedicated to selling cakes and sweets on foot. Together they have one child who currently is in his fifth year of high school.

Walter is dedicated to photography service. He does this work eight hours a day. In one day, Walter can attend to approximately 15 customers and this allows him to earn approximately S. 35 daily and, on a good day, he can earn up to S. 70, which helps with some of the additional home bills as well as support his spouse selling her products. He believes that his business is going well because he is very friendly with customers and because he completes his work on time.

Currently, he is very thankful for the Kiva loans since with this support he can purchase materials and printers for his business. This improvement will help him to have a more modern printer and be able to complete more printing jobs than today and in a few months expand his shop which will help him earn more income and fulfill his great dream: to purchase land to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase materials and printers.

loans.name: Piedad

texts.es: Piedad con su anterior credikiva compró mercancías para atender lo pedidos de su clientela sin depender de los anticipos o cuotas iniciales que le suelen entregar sus clientes y esto la hizo muy feliz. Ahora se propone acceder a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará en mayor cantidad mercancía que viene en los descuentos que traen los catálogos e incursionar en una nueva línea de productos como calzado que comprará en la ciudad de Pereira. Su préstamo  tendrá éxito porque lo hace en una época de mucho movimiento comercial porque hay una buena rotación de dinero por efecto de compras  y estará fundamentada en pedidos de sus mejores clientes. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Que Dios les conceda muchas bendiciones por la ayuda recibida.”
texts.en: Piedad, with her previous CrediKiva, purchased merchandise in order to attend to her customers' orders without depending on the advances or initial fees that her customers usually provided and this made her very happy. Now, she proposes to access a new loan with which she will purchase merchandise in greater quantities that comes at a discount from catalogs and to enter into a new line of products, like footwear that she will be in the city of Pereira. Her loan will be successful because she is doing this in a season of much commercial movement because there is a good rotation of money due to purchases and orders will be based on her best customers. Her message to the lenders of Kiva is the following: "May God grant you many blessings for the help received."

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in greater quantities that comes at a discount from catalogs and to enter into a new line of products, like footwear.

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es:
José, administra un taller automotriz, desde hace 15 años tiene el negocio de enderezado y pintura, él vive con su esposa y tres hijos en casa propia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de un compresor, que es una necesidad en el taller, con este espera mejorar la capacidad de sus trabajos y el servicio a los clientes.
El objetivo de José es que su taller mantenga todos los materiales y herramientas necesarias para el buen funcionamiento, ya que esto le permitirá aumentar sus trabajos y tener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
José has been running an auto mechanic and body workshop for 15 years. He lives with his wife and their three children in his own house.
He is requesting a loan to buy a compressor, an item he needs for the workshop: he hopes to improve the volume of his activity and the service to his customers.
José aims at keeping his workshop stocked up with all the materials and tools he needs for its good functioning, as this will allow him to work more and to earn better income.

loans.use: To buy a compressor.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, de 55 años de edad, es una mujer con mucha experiencia en los negocios, además es alegre y amable, es conviviente con Dennis quien es pescador. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en compañía de sus hijos de 18 y 15 años de edad, de su padre y madre. Las actividades que realiza Carmen es la venta de ropa de segundo uso la cual compra en los centros comerciales de la ciudad, y los lleva a vender por los caseríos ubicados en los márgenes del los ríos, realizando ésta actividad desde hace 2 años. Del mismo modo se dedica a la pesca para lo cual cuenta con un bote pesquero, internadose en el río junto a lado de su pareja y 02 ayudantes a los que paga hasta 200 nuevos soles por su trabajo, dicha actividad lo realiza desdea hace 04 años.
Le gusta ambas actividades ya que la mantiene ocupada y se decidió por ellas por la necesidad de tener un oficio para contar un ingreso económico para solventar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de sus hijos. Por lo contario, le incomoda cuando en una jornada no logran pescar lo suficiente para cubrir los gastos de la pesca, muchas veces debido a la crecientes, por lo que provoca la escacez de peces, pero eso no la desanima y continua, teniendo planes de seguir en su negocio. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal ya que considera a su grupo ser unido y colaborador. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles tiene planes de invertir en la compra de ropa de segundo uso a precio por mayor, así como comprar materiales para pesca como trampas y redes.
texts.en:
Carmen is 55 years old. She is a woman with a lot of business experience. She is also cheerful and friendly. She lives with Dennis, who is a fisherman. Together they live in their own home with their children, aged 18 and 15. Carmen's activities are selling used clothing which she buys in the city's shopping centers and sells them in the communities located on the riverbanks. She has done this for 2 years. She also fishes and has a fishing boat. She goes into the river with her spouse and 2 helpers whom they pay up to 200 nuevos for their work. She has done that activity for 4 years. 

She likes both activities since they keep her busy. She decided on both them because she needed a trade to have some income to pay for the household expenses and her children's education. On the other hand, she doesn't like it when a day's work doesn't bring in enough fish to cover the fishing expenses. Oftentimes, the waxing moon makes the fish scarce, but she doesn't get discouraged and she continues planning to stay in the business. This will be her first loan with the MFP institution and she hopes to have your contribution to meet her goals. She also remarks that she is pleased with her communal bank, since she considers her group to be close and cooperative. With the amount she has asked for, 1000 nuevos soles, she plans on investing in buying used clothing wholesale, as well as in buying fishing materials such as traps and nets.

loans.use: to buy used clothing and fishing materials such as nets and traps.

loans.name: Tomas Manuel

texts.es:
El señor  Manuel , es un humilde agricultor de café , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida y apoyar siempre en sus estudios a sus hijos  ; ya que la situación del país está muy dura económicamente , lo cual se ha visto en la obligación de laborar como guarda de seguridad tres veces a la semana y el resto del tiempo se lo dedica al cultivo , el necesita con mucha urgencia comprar fertilizantes e insumos para poder aplicarlo sobre las plantas ya que estas carecen abono y este año la producción no fue tan buena y solo logro sacar los costos .
Espera que para el próximo año sea diferente porque es el mayor  recurso con el que cuenta para poder apoyar a su familia y salir adelante .Agradece el apoyo que brinda Afodenic atraves de los fondos Kiva ya que sin ellos no podrían lograr sus sueños .
texts.en:
Sr. Manuel is a humble coffee farmer. His plans for his family include improving their living conditions and providing constant support for his children’s studies. The financial situation in the country is very difficult, so he meets his obligations by working as a security guard three times a week. Manuel spends the rest of his time farming. He urgently needs to purchase fertilizers and supplies for his crops because his production for this year has not been good. So far, he has only managed to recover his costs.

Manuel hopes that next year will be different and result in more income so that he can support his family and help them move forward. He appreciates the support from AFODENIC by providing Kiva funds, which have helped to make his dreams possible.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farming supplies.

loans.name: Lorena  Emilse

texts.es: Lorena de 27 años de edad vive con su esposo y tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 1 y 5 años., en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, a orillas del mar caribe. Allí tiene una tienda donde vende ranchos, víveres, licores, carnes, enlatados, embutidos y bienes de consumo de la canasta familiar. Sus principales clientes son amas de casa ubicadas en su barrio y en los alrededores del sector donde  se encuentra su tienda. Su negocio lo inició en el año 2005, después de haber conocido a su esposo, un veterano tendero, oriundo del departamento de Santander, muy conocedor de los procesos administrativos de una tienda y Lorena atenta a todo, aprendió rápidamente a trabajar en su microempresa. Su tienda es muy importante para ella, porque además de generar ingresos con los que contribuye al bienestar de su familia, le permite estar mucho mas tiempo atendiendo a sus pequeños, responder por las actividades inherentes de su hogar y a sus estudios profesionales de administración de empresas. Su meta es continuar ampliando su negocio, hasta convertirlo en un autoservicio con mayor tecnología. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará en mayor volumen víveres para aumentar el surtido, obteniendo descuentos y por comprar de contado, así empezaría su aumento de capital de trabajo y la puesta en marcha de su sueño emprendedor.
texts.en:
Lorena, 27, lives with her husband and two children, ages 1 and 5, in the town of Puerto Colombia on the Caribbean shore.  There she has a store where she sells fast food, groceries, liquor, meat, canned goods, sausage and goods for everyday consumption.  Her main customers are the homemakers living in her neighborhood and neary communities.  She started her business in 2005 after meeting her husband, a long-time store owner from the department of Santander.  He is very familiar with the administrative processes of a store and Lorena, who is on top of everything, learned quickly how to run a mini-enterprise.

Her store is very important to her as it generates an income for the well-being of the family.  It allows her to spend more time with her children and take care of household activities, while also studying business administration.

Her goal is to continue growing the business and turn it into a supermarket with more technology.  This is why she is requesting a Credikiva loan, which is her first one through the Mario Santo Domingo Fountation.  She plans to use it to buy greater volumes of groceries to increase her stock.  This will allow her greater discounts through paying in cash.  She can then increase her working capital and realize her entrepreneurial dream.

loans.use: To buy greater amounts of groceries.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Doña Ana esta trabajando como, conserje, y la venta de ropa usada, con el proposito de obtener mejores ingresos, sus hijos son casados, y es madre soltera. Una mujer emprendedora, que tambien sabe de costura y saca en tiempos libre, ya que le gusta poder cubrir sus gastos personales como sus compromisos de pago.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo comprara cuatro bolsones de ropa de pacas, variadas para poder fortalecer su comercio y sastifacer el gusto del cliente, con productos accesible y de bajo costos.
texts.en:
Ana is working as a janitor, and she sells used clothes.  She does this in order to get better income.  She is a single mother, and her children are married.

She is an enterprising woman.  She also knows how to sew, which she does in her free time.  She likes being able to cover her personal expenses like her commitments to make payments.

Now, with this new loan, she will buy four large bags of bundles of clothes.  She will buy a variety in order to strengthen her business.  She wants to satisfy her customers’ preferences with accessible products at a low cost.

loans.use: buy four large bags of bundles of clothes in order to increase sales.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: El señor  Manuel, es un humilde agricultor de piña, durante mucho tiempo, él está muy contento por el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atraves de los fondo Kiva, ya que con el financiamiento anterior logro mejor su cultivo sacando producción de calidad, el obstáculo que tuvo fue la enfermedad   de su hijo que fue operado de emergencia de la vesícula ; los planes que tiene para este próximo año es poder establecer un cuarto de piña y asi mejorar  sus ingresos para construir poco a poco su humilde vivienda y gozar de una vida digna junto a sus seres querido .
texts.en:
Manuel is a humble pineapple farmer, and he has been doing this work for a long time.  He is very happy about the support that Afondenic offers through Kiva loans.  With his previous loan he managed to improve his crop and get quality production.

The obstacle that he had was his son’s illness.  He had an emergency gall bladder operation.

The plan that he has for next year is to be able to set up just under half of an acre of land to grow pineapples.  This way he will improve his income.  He will use the income to, little by little, build his humble home and enjoy a decent life together with his loved ones.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies.

loans.name: Yuri Antonio

texts.es: Yuri Antonio se dedica a brindar el servicio de tricitaxi, ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, en cual ha sido un excelente cliente y a demostrado la responsabilidad que tiene con un crédito. Este negocio que tiene Yuri es muy utilizado por la comunidad donde él vive, ya  que tiene los clientes fijos y eventuales que utilizan sus  servicios. Yuri está muy agradecido con el financiamiento que se le ha brindado por que ha mejorado poco a poco su herramienta de trabajo como es tricitax. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para comprar lo son pedales, cadenas, entre otros arreglos que quiere realizarle a su tricitaxi.
texts.en:
Yuri Antonio earns a living running a tricycle taxi service.  He already received financing through the Fundación León 2000 and has been an excellent client, demonstrating that he is responsible with a loan.  Yuri's business is very popular in the community where he lives, so he has s fixed customer base as well as spontaneous customers who require his services.  

Yuri is very grateful for the financing he has received and has been able to make improvements to his tricycle taxi, which is his work tool.  The loan he is currently requesting is to buy pedals, chains and other spare parts to fix up his vehicle.

loans.use: To buy pedals, chains and other spare parts.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
Martina, es empleada, vive con sus padres, está soltera, no tiene hijos, trabaja desde hace un año como empleada de una pastelería muy reconocida en el país, como despachadora, también está estudiando en la universidad.
Ella solicita un préstamo para  la compra de una mini laptop, ya que le servirá para las tareas que le demanda la universidad, este préstamo será muy útil para ella, ya que no dispone de todo el dinero para realizar la compra.
La aspiración de Martina es continuar sus estudios, también trabajar responsablemente ya que se auto financia su carrera.
texts.en:
Martina is an employed worker and lives with her parents.  She is single, with no children, and has been working for a year now as a dispatcher in a bakery that is well-known throughout the country.  She is also a university student.

She is requesting a loan to buy a mini laptop so she can do her university classwork.  The loan will be very helpful for her since she does not have all the money she needs to make the purchase.

Martina's goal is to continue her education and work responsibly so she can finance her studies.

loans.use: To buy a mini laptop.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es: Liliana, de 29 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y sociable, es conviviente con Jhonny quien es pescador, vive en compañía de su pareja, sus dos hijos de 10 y 3 años de edad, su cuñada y sus dos sobrinos, habitando su propia casa. El negocio que tiene Liliana es la venta de pescado que su pareja pesca en los lagos de la localidad como el lago de Yarinacocha. Para eso cuentan con un pequeño bote donde su pareja sale a realizar las faenas de pesca, para luego ella venderlo al por mayor entre los comerciantes de los mercados de la localidad, y una parte lo vende al por menor en un puesto que tiene en el puerto. Contando solo con el apoyo de su pareja para ésta actividad que vienen realizando desde hace 10 años. Le gusta su negocio ya le ha generado muchas satisfacciones tanto personales como económicas ya que con los ingresos ha podido solventar los gastos de su hogar, así como comprarse enseres del hogar entre otros gustos. Además comenta que con las buenas ganancias que le deja sobre todo en tiempos de escasez, tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y hacerlo crecer para así tener más ingresos. Este será el préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo para avanzar con su negocio, además de sentirse bien con su banco comunal ya que hasta ahora no ha tenido problemas y ve que son buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles tiene planeado invertir en la compra de materiales para pesca como trampas, y mejorar su puesto de venta, como el techado por las constantes lluvias.
texts.en:
Liliana, 29, is a hardworking and dedicated woman, in addition to being cheerful and sociable. She is in a committed relationship with Jhonny who is a fisherman, with whom she lives along with her two children of 10 and 3 years of age, her sister-in-law and two nephews, inhabiting her own home. The business Liliana has is selling the fish that her partner fishes in the area's lakes such as Yarinacocha Lake. For this purpose they have a small boat in which her partner goes out to do the work of fishing, so that she may then sell it wholesale among the merchants in the area markets. Another portion of it she sells retail at a fish stand she has at the port. 

She relies only upon her partner's support in this business, which she has had for ten years. She likes her business as it has generated many satisfactions both personal and financial. With the income she has been able to pay the costs of running a household as well as purchase household furniture and fittings along with other things they wanted. She comments in addition that with the good earnings she receives, above all in times of scarcity, she has plans to expand her business and make it grow so as to bring in more income. 

This will be her second loan with the MFP institution. She is grateful for the financial support she has been receiving to move forward in her business. She is also pleased with her communal bank since so far she has not had any problems and sees that they are good people. With the requested sum of 1,000 Peruvian soles she plans to invest in the purchase of materials for fishing, such as traps, and improve her fish stand, specifically the roof which has been affected by the constant rain.

loans.use: to purchase fishing tools such as traps, as well as improving the roof of the stand where she makes her sales.

loans.name: Lucia Margarita

texts.es:
Lucia, vive con sus abuelos, no tiene compromisos a parte de sus abuelos, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras y mariscos, este negocio lo heredo de su abuela, y se ha hecho cargo del negocio desde hace un año.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de verduras y mariscos, papas, güisquiles, yuca, tomates, chiles, cebollas, también camarones, pescado, para mejorar el inventario y aumentar su negocio.
Este préstamo espera que pueda mejorar el crecimiento en el negocio, para que así también aumenten sus ganancias para ayudar a sus abuelos.
texts.en:
Lucia lives with her grandparents, and has no family to care for except for them. She works selling vegetables and seafood, and she took over this business from her grandma. She has been in charge of the business for a year.

She is asking for a loan to buy vegetables and seafood: potatoes, chayote, yucca, tomatoes, peppers, onions, shrimp, and fish, to improve her inventory and expand her business. She hopes the loan will allow her to grow the business, increase earnings, and help her grandparents.

loans.use: buy potatoes, chayote, yucca, tomatoes, peppers, and onions.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 21 años de edad, es una mujer joven con muchos deseos de superación, así como alegre y dinámica, es conviviente con Juan quien trabaja en construcción civil, fruto de esa unión tiene un hija de 1 años de nacida, habitando su propia casa. La actividad que realiza María es la venta de bebidas gaseosas, lo cual realiza desde su casa, en donde tiene instalado un refrigerador que compró con el apoyo de su pareja, para poder refrigerar sus bebidas y venderlas heladas al gusto  de sus clientes. También vende helados de una reconocida marca contando con una exhibidora que le fuera prestada para dicho productos, realizando ambas actividades desde hace 01 año ella sola.
Le agrada sus actividades ya que le permiten tener una ocupación en casa y tener tiempo libre para poder atender a  su pequeña hija, así como el ingreso adicional que le permite apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar de esa manera espera progresar  para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija. Por otro lado le va muy bien con su negocio, por ello tiene planes de continuar y hacerlo crecer en volumen, así como incursionar en la venta de ropa de niños desde su casa, trayendo dicho producto desde la ciudad de Lima. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP.  Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Además comenta sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal pues los considera un grupo unido y responsable. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles tiene planes de invertir en la compra de ropa para niños a precio por mayor y venderlo entre sus amistades.
texts.en:
21-year-old María is a young woman who has a great desire to improve herself.  She is a cheerful and dynamic woman.  She lives with her partner Juan, who is in the house building business.  The couple have one daughter who is a year old and they live in their own home.  María's business is selling soda.  She carries out her business from home where she has a refrigerator that she bought with the support of her partner.  She cools her drinks in the refrigerator and sells them chilled, to her customers' taste.  She also sells iced treats from a well-known brand.  She has a display cabinet which was loaned to her for these products.  She has been carrying out these two business activities on her own for one year.

María enjoys her businesses as they allow her to work from home and have some free time in which to care for her young daughter.  They also make her additional income which allows her to support her partner with their household expenses.  She hopes to make progress so that she can provide her daughter with a better quality of life.  María's business is doing very well and she has plans to continue in it and to grow her business volume.  She also plans to start selling children's clothing from home.  She will buy these products in the city of Lima.

This will be María's second loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support as she will feel able to make progress in her business.  She says that she feels comfortable with her community bank as she considers it to be a united and responsible group.  María will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to invest in buying children's clothing wholesale.  She will sell the clothing to her friends.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.es: Jennifer, de 23 años de edad, es una joven mujer emprendedora y trabajadora, además de ser alegre y extrovertida, es conviviente con Antony quien es empleado, vive en compañía de sus suegros, sus cuñadas y su pareja, habitando la casa de su suegra. Las actividades que realiza Jennifer son la compra y venta de motos de segundo uso, dedicándose a éste negocio desde hace 6 meses contado con el apoyo de su pareja , con quien comparte la sociedad de éste negocio. Paralelo a ese negocio también tiene otro negocio en sociedad con su suegra que es un cevicheria que está funcionando en un local en la casa de su suegra, teniendo ese negocio desde hace 01 años ayudándoles a atender al público consumidor sus cuñadas. Le gusta ambos negocios ya que le generan varios ingresos económicos y puede ver como crecer su capital invertido, además de sentirse una prospera empresaria. Tiene planes de invertir en otro negocio que seria abrir una tienda de venta de ropa y juguetes de niños en alguna zona comercial de la ciudad.  Este será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además comenta sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal pues considera que son personas amables y responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y juguetes de niños a precio por mayor trayendo desde la capital.
texts.en:
Jennifer, age 23, is an enterprising and hardworking young woman. In addition, she is a cheerful extrovert. Jennifer is in a common-law relationship with Antony, who is employed, and they live in the home of her in-laws. Her activities include buying and selling secondhand motorcycles. She has been in this business for six months and has the support of her partner, who helps with managing the business. Jennifer also manages another business with her mother-in-law, a “cevicheria” (a restaurant that serves marinated seafood) that is located at her in-laws’ house. She has been in this business for one year and her sisters-in-law help attend to the customers. Jennifer likes the fact that both businesses generate income, so she is able to see her investment capital grow. In addition, she feels that she is a prosperous entrepreneur.

Jennifer has plans to invest in another business. She will open a store that sells clothing and children’s toys in a shopping center in the city. This will be her third loan with the MFP organization, so she hopes to receive cooperation so that she can continue with her goals. In addition, she feels comfortable working with her Communal Bank because she considers the members to be friendly and responsible people. The amount of 2000 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of clothing and children’s toys. This capital will enable her to get a wholesale price.

loans.use: to buy toys and children's clothing.

loans.name: Olga De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Olga, se dedica a la venta de verduras, vive con su hija de 12 años de edad, quien le ayuda a despachar a los clientes, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado municipal, además vende de manera ambulante, lleva 6 años en el negocio.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de verduras, tomates, papas, cebollas, repollo, para el negocio, aumentando los productos frescos para ofrecer a los clientes.
El objetivo de Olga es fortalecer el negocio y tener mejores ingresos de las ventas, para aumentar los beneficios a su familia y sobre todo a su hija.
texts.en:
Olga works selling vegetables. She lives with her 12 year old daughter who helps her attend to the customers. Her business is in the city market, and she also sells on the street. She has done this work for 6 years.

She is asking for a loan to buy vegetables (tomatoes, potatoes, onion, and cabbage) for her business, to increase the amount of fresh produce to offer to her customers.

Olga's goal is to strengthen her business and achieve higher earnings from her sales, in order to increase the benefits for her family--especially for her daughter.

loans.use: buy vegetables (tomatoes, potatoes, onion, cabbage)

loans.name: Yesenia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Yesenia tiene 28 años de edad y vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada Brasilia, en la provincia de Alajuela. Por esa área se da mucho el turismo por motivo del Volcán Arenal ubicado en sus cercanías, con el bosque nubloso de Monteverde y las tierras bajas del norte del país. En Alajuela existen cinco parques nacionales, una reserva nacional de fauna silvestre, cinco zonas protectoras y varias reservas forestales. También en la provincia se ubica el Museo Juan Santamaría, el cual exhibe artesanías producidas localmente. Esta zona ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña.
 
Desde hace varios meses  Yesenia se dedica a su negocio. Ella brinda sus servicios a los vecinos de la comunidad, quienes se muestran muy satisfechos por la calidad.

Actualmente Yesenia está solicitando un microcrédito de 400,000.00 (cuatrocientos mil colones), para la compra de los ingredientes o materia prima para su panadería, ya que quiere darles a sus clientes el mejor calidad de producto, necesita solventar y tener otro ingreso económico para su hogar. 

Ella es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Brasilia S.A, razón por la cual está  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 28 years old and lives with her family in Brasilia, a community in the province of Alajuela. In this area, a lot of tourists come to see Arenal Volcano which is located nearby, and also to see the Monteverde cloud forest and the lowlands in the northern area of the country. In Alajuela there are five national parks, a national wildlife reserve, five protected zones, and many forest reserves. The Juan Santamaría Museum is also in this province, and has exhibits of locally made handicrafts. This zone is the nation's number one producer of coffee and sugar cane.

Yesenia has been working at her business for several months. She provides service to the neighbors of her community, and they are very satisfied by the quality of her products.

She is asking for a loan of 400,000 colones to buy ingredients and supplies for her bakery, as she wishes to give her customers the best quality products. In order to do that, she needs a loan and she wants to have additional income for her home.

She is a member of the Brasilia Community Credit Union, and is very thankful for the opportunities provided her by accessing a loan. It will allow her to realize the goals in her life.

loans.use: buy supplies for her bakery

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Josefa, es una humilde agricultora de la zona de Ticuantepe, junto a su familia, los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar su calidad de vida, la mayor afectación que se le presento fue que le detectaron problemas en su matriz, lo cual fue operada de emergencia. Para ella y su familia fue muy difícil ya que ellos por ser muy pobres no tenían un seguro de vida y con lo que logaron cosechar vendieron el cultivo y pagaron la operación y ahora no cuentan con recursos económicos para poder comprar nuevamente fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para darle el mantenimiento adecuado a plantación y asi poder seguir trabajando en sus cultivos .
texts.en:
Sra. Josefa is a humble farmer who lives with her family in the District of Ticuantepe. Her plans for the future include improving their quality of life. The major challenge that she faced was dealing with problems detected with her reproductive system, which required an emergency operation. This was very difficult for her and her family because they are very poor and have no insurance. Their harvest was used to pay for the operation, and now they have no financial resources to buy fertilizers and necessary supplies for maintaining what they have planted.

This will help Josefa continue working with her crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farming supplies.

loans.name: Maria Edelmira

texts.es:
María, vive en casa propia, tiene tres hijos, ellos trabajan y le ayudan a Maria con los gastos del hogar, ella se dedica a la venta de atoles, tamales y pan dulce o francés, este negocio lo tiene en la entrada principal al mercado.
 Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para elaborar los tamales y el atol, como maíz, leche, azúcar, condimentos, hojas de huerta, el dinero de este préstamo será una gran ayuda para mejorar la producción de su negocio.
El objetivo de María es tener un negocio estable, para mantener ingresos y cubrir sus gastos, así también quiere capacitarse más para mejorar el sabor de los productos.
texts.en:
María lives in her own home. She has three children and they work and help her with the expenses of the home. She works selling atoles (warm, corn-based beverages), tamales, sweet bread, and French bread. She has her business at the main entrance to the market.

She is asking for a loan to buy products for making tamales and atoles, like corn, milk, sugar, condiments, and leaves, and the loan money will be of great help in improving production at her business.

María's goal is to have a stable business, to maintain her income, and cover expenses. She also wants to gain more skills in order to improve the flavor of her products.

loans.use: buy corn, milk, sugar, condiments, and leaves for wrapping tamales

loans.name: Rudy Francisco

texts.es: Rudy Francisco es un persona trabajadora lucha por sacar a sus hijos adelante junto con su esposo, el trabaja como panadero en una panadería en cual el salario que devenga no cubre para realizar las mejoras de la vivienda. Rudy está solicitando crédito a Fundación león 2000, para realizarle las mejoras a su casa ya que cuando llueve se le pase y  incomodo para la familia por que se monja. Este crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de hierro, cemento, láminas de zinc.
texts.en: Rudy Francisco is a hardworking person who struggles to provide for his wife and children.  He works as a baker in a bakery, but the salary he earns is not sufficient to allow him to make improvements to his home.  Rudy is requesting a loan from Fundación León 2000 in order to make some improvements to his house, because when it rains, the water gets into the house and his family becomes wet and uncomfortable.  The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy iron, cement, and sheets of corrugated metal roofing material.

loans.use: to buy iron, cement, and sheets of corrugated metal roofing material

loans.name: Cain

texts.es: Caín, de 27 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y con muchos deseos de superación, así como alegre y amable, es conviviente con Lety quien es comerciante, vive en compañía de su pareja, su padre, su madre y sus 04 hermanos, habitando la casa de sus padres. La actividad que realiza Caín es la transporte de pasajeros para lo cual cuenta con un mototaxi que compró con sus ahorros hace 01 año. Para realizar su trabajo se levanta muy de temprano para buscar sus pasajeros por las calles de la ciudad realizando su jornada hasta el medio día, hora en que regresa a descansar, para luego volver a salir por unas horas en las tardes. Le gusta su actividad ya que puede manejar sus tiempos libres, y comenta se decidió por ésta actividad por la necesidad de tener un oficio y por los ingresos económicos ya que tenía muchas necesidades y gastos que no podía solventar, ahora se siente más tranquilo y cómodo ya que tiene un ingreso permanente y cuenta con más tiempo libre. Por lo contario comenta que le incomoda un poco cuando llueve muy seguido ya que esto dificulta su trabajo, pero eso no lo desanima y continua trabajando. Tiene como proyecto adquirir un camión para dedicarse al transporte de carga. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP.  Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues se siente cómodo pues considera a sus integrantes ser personas amables y buenas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, tiene planes de invertir en los trámites de la compra de un camión de transporte de carga.
texts.en: Twenty-seven-year-old Caín is a hardworking man with a great desire to get ahead.  He is a happy and friendly person who lives with his partner, Lety, who is a storekeeper, his father, his mother, and his four siblings in his parents' home.  Caín works in transportation for a living with the mototaxi he bought with his savings one year ago.  He wakes up very early for work to look for passengers in the city's streets.  He works until noon, when he returns to rest, only to set out again later for a few hours in the afternoon.  He likes his work because he controls his free time and he tells us that he decided on this work because he needed a trade and income because he needed many things and he had expenses he couldn't afford.  Now he feels more calm and comfortable because he has steady income and because he has more free time.  On the other hand, he tells us that when it rains hard it's inconvenient for him because it makes his work more difficult, but he doesn't get discouraged and keeps on working.  His goal is to get a truck so he can work in trucking.  This will be his second loan with MFP.  As such, he is waiting for their collaboration to be able to carry out his plans.  He also tells us that he is happy with his communal bank because he is comfortable there and he thinks the other members are friendly, good people.  He will invest the sum of 1,000 nuevos soles in the process of buying a cargo truck.

loans.use: to make a down payment on a cargo truck

loans.name: Moises Adalberto

texts.es:
Moisés, vive con su esposa, él se dedica a atender una ladrillera, su trabajo es realizar con concreto los ladrillos y bloques para la construcción de viviendas, este negocio  lo tiene en un espacio de su vivienda, a este lugar llegan sus clientes para solicitar estos productos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de arena y cemento, ya que son sus materiales necesarios para la ejecución del trabajo, con esto pretende aumentar su producción y mejorar la disponibilidad para los clientes.
Su aspiración es mejorar el negocio y las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Moisés lives with his wife. He makes a living doing brickwork. At his job, he uses concrete to make bricks and blocks for housing. He has a place for this business in his home, and his customers come to this place to ask for his products. 

Right now he is asking for a loan to buy sand and cement, since these are the necessary materials for doing his job, and with this he hopes to increase his production and improve his availability to his customers. 

His dream is to improve his business and his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy sand and cement.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, ellos son independientes, y ella se dedica a atender una granja en su vivienda, es ama de casa, lleva 10 años comercializando con cerdos, aprendió este negocio por sus padres, ya que se dedicaron de igual manera a criar cerdos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de dos cerdos grandes, comprara harinilla, para alimentarlos, esta compra le ayudara para crecer con la granja, algunos de sus riesgos es que los cerdos se enfermen y pueda perderlos.
Ella quiere seguir trabajando fuerte de la mano de los prestamos, así mejorara la estabilidad económica de su familia.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two children. They are independent, and she makes a living taking care of the farm where they live. She is a housewife and has been marketing pigs for ten years. She learned this trade from her parents, since they also made a living raising pigs. 

Right now she is asking for a loan for the purchase of two big pigs and to buy blue cornmeal to feed them. This purchase will help her expand the farm. A few of her risks are that the pigs could get sick, or she could lose them. 

She wants to continue working hard thanks to the loans. Through them she will improve the economic stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase two big pigs and blue cornmeal.

loans.name: Bismarck

texts.es: El señor Bismarck , es un pequeño agricultor / Comerciante , de la zona de San Ignacio , desde muy joven se dedica al cultivo de pitahaya , la mayor afectación que se le presento fue el invierno ya que de tana lluvia un 40 % del cultivo se perdió y no logro ganar lo esperado , ahora necesita comprar fertilizantes e insumos para aplicar a la cosecha , pero no cuenta con los recursos económicos para realizar  la inducción , lo cual solicita apoyo de Afodenic atraves de los fondo Kiva , para rescatar el cultivo y seguir trabajando para tener en un futuro una cosecha de calidad y asi mejorar su casita  ; ya que la agricultura es su fuente de trabajo y de ingresos para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia .
texts.en: Bismark is a small-scale farmer and merchant from the San Ignacio area.  He has worked growing pitaya since he was very young.  The greatest challenge he faced was the winter because all of the rain caused him to lose 40% of his crop and he wasn't able to earn what he anticipated.  Now he needs to buy fertilizers and supplies for his harvest, but he doesn't have the finances to make those purchases.  That's why he is asking for Afodenic's help through Kiva, to save his crop and keep working for a good crop in the future.  That will allow him to improve his small home because agriculture is the source of work and income that allows him to provide his family with their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
Leticia is 33 years old, married, and has five children. She also has three additional dependents, who live with her--her brothers and sisters whom she assists with their schooling. 

In 2009, Leticia established her clothing business. She began her business to be self-reliant. She sells to women, especially young women. Working six days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,800,000 every month from this business. 

Leticia is requesting a loan for Le 4,000,000, which she will use to buy ladies' jeans, t-shirts, shoes, sneakers, and blouses for her business. Leticia has already received and successfully repaid two loans, She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000.  In the future, Leticia plans to expand her business to a location in the nearby market.

loans.use: to purchase ladies' blouses, jeans, t-shirts, shoes, and sneakers.

loans.name: Jose Hudil

texts.es:
José, es ganadero y agricultor, tiene 38 años de edad, vive con sus hijos de 16 y 14 años, también le acompaña su suegra, él se dedica a atender las labores ganaderas y agrícolas, sembrando maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de experiencia y lo aprendió por su padre.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de 3 reces, ya que se le presenta la oportunidad de aumentar el número de reces en el terreno, mejorando su capacidad ganadera.
La aspiración de José es que sus hijos crezcan, se desarrollen, aprendan a trabajar para que se defiendan en un futuro.
texts.en:
José is a rancher and farmer. He is 38 years old and lives with his children of 16 and 14 years, as well as with his mother-in-law. His job is to take care of stockbreeding and agricultural tasks, planting corn and beans. He has 15 years of experience and learned it from his father. 

Right now he is asking for a loan for the purchase of three heads of cattle, since he has been presented with the chance to increase the number of animals on the land, improving his ranching ability. 

José's goal is that his children grow, develop, and learn to work so they can take care of themselves in the future.

loans.use: to buy three heads of cattle.

loans.name: Tito Esau

texts.es:
Tito, tiene un taller de sastrería y venta de desinfectante, vive con su esposa y desde hace tres años está dedicada al negocio, tiene varios clientes que le solicitan sus trabajos de sastre así también sale a vender ambulante el desinfectante por los lugares cercanos.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de material para hacer desinfectantes, también comprara telas de diferentes colores y tipos, esto mejorara su capacidad.
La aspiración de Tito es mejorar su negocio y poder ofrecerle a sus hijos un futuro mas alentador.
texts.en: Tito has a tailor shop and sells disinfectant. He lives with his wife and he's been in this business for three years. He has various customers who come to him for tailoring work, and he also goes out to sell disinfectant in nearby places. At this time he is asking for a loan to buy the materials to make disinfectants, and he will also buy fabric in different colors and types and this will increase his potential. Tito aspires to improve his business and to be able to offer his children a more encouraging future.

loans.use: to buy the materials to make disinfectant, and fabric in different colors.

loans.name: Roger Antonio

texts.es: El señor Roger , es habitante del municipio de Masaya , junto a su familia , desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de yuca , la mayor afectación que se le presento durante la cosecha fue , que por problemas económicos emigro hacia Costa Rica , pensando que allá tendría más oportunidades de trabajo y no fue asi ; dejando a cargo la producción  de yuca a su esposa y su hijo mayor los cuales no tienen la experiencia sobre la plantación , dejándola  sola mucho tiempo sin ningún cuido , lo que aprovechar a robarle gran parte de la misma ; ahora él se encuentra en un una situación muy difícil ya que no cuenta con recursos económicos para seguir trabajando dignamente en su país ; ya que su experiencia vivida le sirvió de mucho y con mucha tristeza y lagrimas en su cara dice que jamás volverá a  dejar a su familia y su país.
texts.en:
Roger lives in the town of Masaya with his family.  He has worked growing yucca for several years.  The greatest challenge that presented itself during the harvest was that he emigrated to Costa Rica because of financial problems, thinking that he would have more job opportunities there, but it was not the case.  He left his wife and oldest son in charge of the yucca production, but not having experience in the field, they left it alone with no care for a long time, which took the opportunity of cheating him of a large part of the production.

Now he finds himself in a very difficult situation since he has no economic resources to continue working with dignity in his country.  He says with great sadness and tears on his face that he will never leave his family and his country again, since the experience he had served him very well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, oil, firewood, and condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Junisa

texts.en:
This is 49-year-old Junisa.  He is married and has five children, ages 1, 3, 8, 12 and 15 years. 

In 1996, Junisa established his used clothing business. He was working in the mines and realized that life was becoming very difficult for him, as he was not able to get enough income to support his family. He then left the mines and settled down in Bo City with his family, where he established his used clothing business. This business helps him to get enough income to provide a livelihood for his family. 

Working seven days a week and ten hours a day, he earns about Le 1,700,000 every month from this business. Junisa has a very good loan repayment history. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,500,000. He requires a loan in order to purchase a bale of men’s shirts at Le 1,900,000 and two bales of men’s trousers costing Le 2,600,000. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 350,000. 

In the future, Junisa plans to open another stall of used clothing for his wife and to educate his children to university level. The competition is low and his business is good as it is in the centre of town. His customers are mainly low income earners who cannot afford expensive clothes. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for bales of used clothes for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a motorbike to make getting to work easier.

loans.name: Jessica Pamela

texts.es:
La Señora. Jessica es socia del banco comunal Futuro de Vida, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una gran riqueza cultural, natural y arquitectónica, esta bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Jessica tiene 19 años, vive en unión libre, su esposo trabaja en un taller en donde elaboran cielos rasos, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Ella labora hace 3 meses prestando los servicios en una lavadora de ropa y por las noches está estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad.
 
Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su crédito lo va a invertir para iniciar con el negocio de comida rápida, va a comprar carne, salchichas, pan, papas y otros víveres.

Su meta es ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Jessica is a member of the Futuro de Vida (Future of Life) communal bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city of great cultural, natural, and architectural riches. It is bathed by the four rivers which give it the name Santa Ana of the Four Rivers. Its people maintain their culture and traditions.

Jessica is 19 years old. She lives in a common-law marriage, and her husband works in a workshop where they make ceilings. She does not have her own house, so she rents.

She has worked for 3 months renting out a washing machine, and at night she is studying at a school in the city.

This is her second loan with the communal bank. She will use her loan to start a fast food business. She is going to buy meat, sausages, bread, potatoes, and other foods. 

Her goal is to be a good professional.

loans.use: to purchase meat, sausages, bread, potatoes, and other foods.

loans.name: María Angelina

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Futuro de Vida, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una gran riqueza cultural, natural y arquitectónica, esta bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña María tiene 53 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 27, 21, 18, 16, y 10 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, su segundo hijo trabaja y estudia, su tercera hija estudia en un colegio de la ciudad, su cuarto hijo trabaja solo para sus gastos personales y su ultimo hijo está en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en un taller de aluminio y vidrio, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
La Señora. María hace 10 años se dedica al negocio de venta de joyas de golfild, su mercadería lo vende recorriendo la ciudad y labora 5 días de la semana sin un horario fijo.
 
Es su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de joyas para crecer en este negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
María is a member of the communal bank “The Future of Life.” She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city which is culturally, naturally, and architecturally rich. It is surrounded by four rivers, which give it the name “Santa Ana of the Four Rivers.” Its people maintain the culture and tradition of its villages.

María is 53 years old and married, and from her conjugal union has produced five children, ages 27, 21, 18, 16, and 10. Her oldest daughter is married and lives independently. Her second son works and studies. Her third daughter studies in a high school in the city, and her fourth son works on his own for his personal expenses. Her youngest son is in an elementary school in the city. Her husband works in an aluminum and glass shop. They do not have their own house, which is why they are renting. 

For ten years, María has sold Goldfield jewelry. She walks around the city selling her merchandise, and she works five days a week without a fixed schedule. 

This is her third loan with the communal bank, and she will put the loan towards the purchase of jewelry so that she can expand this business. 

Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Elba Marina

texts.es:
La Señora. Elba es socia del banco comunal Futuro de Vida, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una gran riqueza cultural, natural y arquitectónica, esta bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Elba tiene 39 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 2 hijos de 20 y 2 años de edad, su primera hija estudia. Su esposo labora en la construcción como maestro albañil, no tiene casa propia y vive arrendando.

La Señora. Elba labora hace 13 años como ayudante de cocina, trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde.
 
Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de un carreta para vender salchipapas.
 
Su meta es tener un salón de comida.
texts.en:
Elba is a member of the Futuro de Vida community bank.  She lives in Cuenca, a city with cultural, natural, and architectural riches.  It is surrounded by four rivers, which gives it the name of Santa Ana of the four rivers.  Its people maintain the culture and traditions of their communities.

Elba is 39 years old, lives in a common-law marriage, and has two children, who are 20 and 2 years old.  Her older daughter is in school.  Her husband works in construction as a master bricklayer.  They do not have their own home and they rent.

Elba has worked for 13 years as a assistant cook.  She works from Sunday to Sunday from 7:00am until 5:00pm.  

This is her second loan with the community bank and she plans to invest it in the purchase of a cart to sell salchipapas (fried potatoes with hot dogs).

Her goal is to have a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase a cart.

loans.name: Tommy

texts.en:
This is 33 year-old Tommy.  He is married and has three children aged 2, 4, 7 years-old. In 2001, Tommy established his soft drink and beverages business. Before Tommy established his own business, he was selling for his elder brother who has a shop in one of the villages around Bo City. Haven got enough business experience from his elder brother and he was provided with some small business capital which he used to establish his own business in Bo City. 

Over the years, this business has made Tommy self reliant and has provided a reliable source of livelihood for his family. Tommy is very hard working and is determined to see that his business continues to prosper. He opens his business about 7 am and closes at 6 pm every day. Tommy earns about Le 1,600,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Tommy has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy: 10 crates of soft drinks at Le 300,000, 10 cartoons of Carlsberg at Le 1, 200, 000 for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000.

In the future, Tommy plans to open his business in the outskirts of town of Bo City and build a dwelling house for his family. The competition is low and the shop is located around offices, where workers relax during lunch and after work before going to their various homes. This has helped Tommy to get a lot of loyal customers who visit his business daily.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for soft drinks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: María Rosario

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Los Talvos, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, llamada también San Bautista del Valle, tiene hermosos lugares para disfrutar de los paisajes de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran diariamente en la ciudad.

Doña María tiene 39 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 22, 20, 17, 7, 5 y 3 años de edad, dos de sus hijos estudian en el colegio, su hija trabaja y ayuda con los gastos del hogar y dos de sus hijos están estudiando en la escuela. Su esposo labora en la agricultura y es negociante de animales, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora. María se dedica al cuidado de su hogar y labora en la agricultura siendo sus cosechas para su consumo y al igual que su esposo se dedica al negocio de ganado hace 10 años.
 
En el banco comunal es socia hace 15 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos. 

Su meta es tener un taller de costura.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Los Talvos communal bank. She lives in a community in the El Valle parish in Cuenca, also called San Bautista del Valle. It has beautiful places to enjoy the natural landscapes. Its people work in business, raising animals, and agriculture, and many work in the city every day.

María is 39 years old. She is married, and this union has produced 6 children aged 3, 5, 7 ,17, 20, and 22. Two of her children are secondary school students, her daughter works and helps with household expenses, and two of her children are primary school students. Her husband works in agriculture and sells animals. The house they live in belongs to them.

María takes care of her home and works in agriculture. Her family consumes what she harvests, and like her husband, she has sold livestock for 10 years.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 15 years, and she will use her new loan to buy pigs.

Her goal is to have a dressmaking shop.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Ernest

texts.en: This is 47 year-old Ernest.  He is married, and has 3 children aged 3, 7, and 12. He has 1 additional dependent who lives with him. He is a relative from a village where school and health facilities are very poor. He has come to Bo where such facilities are much better. In 2008, Ernest established his building materials business. Ernest was introduced to this type of business by his elder sister. He quickly noticed that people needed building materials in his community and that the business is profitable and so invested money into it. Today this business is his only source of income for his family. Working 6 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,900,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,500,000. Ernest requires a loan in order to buy more building materials for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000. In the future, Ernest plans to open a cosmetics shop for his wife so that she can also help bring more income into their home to improve the standard of living for his family. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for bags of cement and different colors of paint for his business

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. Mariana es socia del banco comunal Los Talvos, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, llamada también San Bautista del Valle, tiene hermosos lugares para disfrutar de los paisajes de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran diariamente en la ciudad.

Doña Mariana tiene 26 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 5 y 4 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en la escuela. Su esposo labora en la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es propiedad de un familiar.

Ella se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y cuidar de sus hijos, como pasa la mayor parte del tiempo en casa cría cerdos, cuyes y pollos.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 4 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y cerdos.

Su meta es tener un local de cabinas telefónicas e internet.
texts.en:
Mariana is a member of the “Los Talvos” communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Del Valle Parish in Cuenca also called San Bautista del Valle.  It has beautiful places to enjoy nature’s scenery and its residents are merchants, raise livestock farm and many of them work daily in the city.

Mariana is 26 years old, married and has two children who are 5 and 4 years old; her oldest son attends school.  Her husband works in construction as a bricklayer.  The house they live in belongs to a relative.

She does her household chores and cares for her children but since she spends most of her time at home she also raises pigs, guinea pigs and chickens.

She has been a member of the communal bank for four years and will use her new loan to buy chickens and pigs.  Her goal is to have an Internet access and telephone booth service center.

loans.use: to buy chicks and piglets.

loans.name: María Transito

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Los Talvos, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, llamada también San Bautista del Valle, tiene hermosos lugares para disfrutar de los paisajes de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran diariamente en la ciudad.

Doña María tiene 47 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos, cinco de ellos son casados y viven independientes y sus dos hijas estudian en una academia. Su esposo es de profesión albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora. María labora en un mercado de la ciudad hace 14 años en un local de comida, trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde. En su casa cría animales como son cerdos, cuyes, pollos y ganado. 

Se encuentra en su segundo crédito en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para continuar con su cría de animales. 

Su meta es mejorar su situación economía y tener un criadero más grande de animales.
texts.en:
María is 47 years old, married and has seven children five of which are married and live independently and her two daughters attend an academy.  Her husband is a bricklayer by profession.  The house they live in is theirs.

María has worked in one of the city’s markets for 14 years at a food stand.  She works Monday through Saturday from 8am until 4pm.  At home, she raises animals like pigs, guinea pigs, chickens and cattle.

She’s in her second loan with the communal bank and will use it to buy chicks to continue raising animals.  Her goal is to improve her economic situation and to have a larger animal nursery.

loans.use: to buy chicks.

loans.name: Sitha

texts.en: Sitha, 44 is widowed, and resides with her mother and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. This is an area which is well known for its historical tourism sites (ancient temples: Angkor Wat, Bayon, Banteay Srey, etc). She sells food and drinks in front of the Siem Reap district hospital. This business is the only source of income to support the family. In order to generate extra income, Sitha requests a loan of USD to purchase a motorbike to use in her business. In the future, she would like to run another food store for her daughter, renew her house and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to use in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wires to connect electricity to her home and pay for connection fees.

loans.name: Trorb

texts.en:
Trorb, 32, is married, and resides with her husband and three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia, an area which is well known for its historical tourism sites (ancient temples: Angkor Wat, Bayon, Banteay Srey, etc). 
She is a firewood vendor. Her husband is a drum producer. All of her children are still in school. Trorb is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a lathe for her husband to produce more drums to sell to his clients. In the future, she would like to expand her husband's business, build a new house and support her children to study until they can get a Bachelors degree.

loans.use: to purchase a lathe to produce more drums to sell to his clients.

loans.name: Melsie

texts.en:
Melsie is 38 years old, married and has two children, aged 5 and 12. In 2006, Melsie established a provisions business, carrying items such as sugar, milk, mayonnaise, margarine, tea, and coffee, etc. Before Melsie established the provisions business, she tried selling textiles for a few years, but realized that she was not making much profit. When she changed the business to provisions, it began proving well for her. Melsie started her business to help her husband provide a livelihood for their family. She earns about SLL 1,600,000 every month by working 6 days a week, 10 hours a day. 

Melsie would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. She has already received and successfully repaid four loans, and now requires a new loan to buy sugar, milk, mayonnaise, margarine, tea and coffee for her provisions business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately SLL 300,000.

In the future, Melsie plans to expand the business to the outskirts of town and to contribute to the building of a dwelling house for their family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for sugar, milk, mayonnaise, margarine, tea, and coffee for her provisions business.

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en: Sophal, 41, is married, and resides with her husband and three children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She runs a grocery store at home. Her husband helps her run this business. Two of her children are employed at the garment factory. Sophal is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase more groceries to sell. In the future, she would like to expand her business of selling groceries and sell a large amount, renew her house and support her children to study until they get Bachelors degree.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Saran

texts.en: Saran, 32, is married and resides with her husband and one child in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a garment worker. Her husband is a black smith. Saran is requesting a loan of US $700 to purchase a motorbike for her husband to use as a motorcycle taxi when he is free from his work. By doing so, her husband will be able to generate extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to renovate her house and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her husband to use as a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Moeurn

texts.en:
Moeurn lives in the Prey Chor district with four single children and one married child. She cultivates rice crops alongside her husband on the farmland there. She is now 48 years old and she has been engaged in this business for more than 26 years. In the next few months, one of her children is going to get married, yet Moeurn has inadequate funds to prepare for the upcoming wedding party. 

At the present, she is seeking funds from HKL to prepare for her second child’s wedding party. This loan will provide satisfaction for the whole family and remove some worries. She is very grateful for the help from our lenders.

loans.use: to prepare for her second child’s wedding party.

loans.name: Dy

texts.en: Dy, 38, is married and resides with his wife and four children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. He is a motor mechanic. His wife is a groceries vendor. Selling groceries is the main source of income in his family. Therefore, Dy is requesting a loan to purchase more groceries to sell to generate more profit to support the family. In the future, he would like to purchase more mechanical equipment to expand his mechanical work. Moreover, he plans to renovate his house and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Dilbaroi

texts.ru:
Дилбарой- труженица,ей 41 лет,имеет одного сына и дочь подросткового возраста.Муж Азим- разнорабочий и имеет работу сезонного характера.Сама занимается бизнесом более 6ти лет, продает продукты питания на центральном продуктовом рынке.В её ассортименте есть необходимые продукты повседневного спроса, такие как яйцо, слив. масло,напитки,сахар и т.д.Исходя из сказанного,её реализация стоит на стабильном уровне.Работает повседневно без перерыва и по необходимости отдыхает.По совету соседей по бизнесу с 2007 года получила первый кредит. Тогда 
 у неё был маленький товарооборот и после кредита постепенно расширила свои активы,улучшила  свою обстановку дома,здоровье...  На предыдущий кредит купила холодильник,который использует на свой бизнес, а на очередной кредит хочет закупить большую партию продуктов,так как  перед Новым годом  она может хорошо реализовать свои продукты.
texts.en:
Dilbaroi is a hard worker. She is 41 years old and has a son and a teenage daughter. Her husband Azim is a handyman and he has a seasonal job. Dilbaroi has been in business for more than six years, selling food at the central food market. In her product range, she has products that are needed daily, like eggs, butter, beverages, sugar and so on. She has a stable income from this business. Dilbaroi works daily without a break, and rests only when needed. 

At the advice of her neighbors, she took her first loan in 2007. Back then she had a small turnover and after the loan she gradually expanded her activities, and improved their situation at home, their health,... For the previous loan she bought a refrigerator, which she uses in her business, and for the next loan she wants to buy a large quantity of products, so that before New Year's she can sell a lot of her products.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of eggs and butter at wholesale price

loans.name: Eart

texts.en: Eart, 36, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a farmer who raises chickens and pigs. Her husband helps her run the business. Eart is requesting a loan of US $1,200 to purchase animal feed for her chickens and pigs, which she will then sell when they gain weight. In the future, she would like to run a poultry farm, build a new house, and support her children's education until they earn bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed for chickens and pigs, which she will sell when they gain weight.

loans.name: Laihoch

texts.en:
Laihoch, 25, is married resides with her husband and one child in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a taxi driver. Her husband is a car mechanic. Since her car is too old, Laihoch is requesting a loan of $1000 US to purchase a new car to run as taxi in her transportation service. 

By doing so, she will attract more customers. Furthermore, she will increase her profits to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a shop that rents cars for tourists to generate more income, build a new house, and support her child's studies through university.

loans.use: to purchase a new car to run as a taxi

loans.name: Prang

texts.en:
Mrs. Prang, 50, is a mother of six children, living together with them in the Baray district. To earn a living, she grows rice and raises some piglets in a wooden pigpen behind her home, while her husband transports and sells firewood from his trailer. This couple has worked very hard for their children, especially their last-born child who is attending school. Prang intends to send him to a university after he finishes high school. 

And now Prang would like to borrow her second loan from HKL to purchase a buffalo that can be used both for working on her farm and hauling the trailer. This loan will improve her business and enable her to generate additional profit. She will save the income generated from her business to buy a plow to develop her farming work towards greater success.

loans.use: to purchase a buffalo.

loans.name: Vantha

texts.en: Vantha, 54, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Chnang Province. Cambodia. She is a rice farmer. Her husband is a fisherman. Three of her children are employed at the garment factory. Growing rice is the main source of income that supports her family. Therefore, Vantha is requesting a loan of USD 400 to purchase rice seed and fertilizer to grow rice in the dry season. In the future, she would like to renew her house and support her children to study until they get Bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to purchase rice seed and fertilizer

loans.name: 05.12.44 Điện Biên Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hòe has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make the processed food to seto purchase sticky rice to make donuts to sell. Hòe has been involved in this business for 5 years. Hòe supports no dependents with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. The main hardship that Hòe faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Hòe is 60 years old and she is married with 3 children. Hòe is the group leader of the 05.12.44 Điện Biên solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. 

In 2011, Hòe joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hòe has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Hòe hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase sticky rice to make donuts to sell

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en: Sokha, 44, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She is a rice farmer. Her husband is a fisherman. Two of her children are employed at the factory in Korea. Sokha requests a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase a pumping machine, rice seed and fertilizer in order to pump the water into the rice field and grow rice in the dry season. In the future, she plans to purchase more farmland to grow an agricultural crop to generate more profit, build a new house and support her children to study further.

loans.use: to purchase a pumping machine, rice seed and fertilizer to grow rice

loans.name: Sang

texts.en: Sang, 61, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a clay pot producer. Her husband is a rice farmer. Additionally, he runs a poultry farm to generate more income. All of her children are employed; one is a weaving tutor and another one is a clay pot tutor. Sang is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase wood to build a new house. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business in order to generate more income to support the family.

loans.use: to purchase wood to build a new house.

loans.name: Phally

texts.en: Phally, 31, is single and resides with her mother and a brother in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She is a garment worker. Her mother is a flat basket maker. Due to not having enough income, Phally is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to run a new business by purchasing clothes to sell in order to generate more income. In the future, she would like to expand her business of selling clothes by renting a store to sell at the market. The woman shown in the photo is her mother.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Bình's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bình operates a food stall/restaurant selling snack. She is requesting a loan to purchase eel to make eel soup  to sell. Bình has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Bình faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Bình is 57 years old and she is married with 4 children. Bình is the group leader of the 05.04.45Điện Biên solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. Bình lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2010, Bình joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Bình has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Bình hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase eel to make eel soup  to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 39 years old and lives in Gango, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has two school-aged children. Arlene has a shop that sells canned goods, soap, toothpaste, and noodles, etc. She has had this business for two years. 

Arlene has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase more canned good, noodles, soap, etc to sell. She has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Arlene hopes to start another business.

loans.use: to purchase more canned good, noodles, and soap to sell.

loans.name: Thu's Group

texts.en:
Mrs.Thu has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food to raise such as sugar, salt,... to sell.

Thu is 50 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the 05.08.47Điện Biên solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 1 dependent.

In 2010, Thu joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Thu has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Thu has been involved in this business for 4 years. The main hardship that Thu faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Thu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase dry food to raise such as sugar, salt,... to sell.

loans.name: Doch

texts.en:
Mrs. Doch is a 50-year-old married woman who has spent most of her life cultivating rice crops in the Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Her husband is also in the same business.  They work together on their own farmland. Mrs. Doch has been blessed with 8 children. 

Her family experiences some difficulty because there is no clean water for use on their property, so they have to go far away to buy and bring water from another villager’s well. To solve the problem, Mrs. Doch decided to borrow some funds from HKL and Kiva to dig a well in her yard. It will cost around KHR 2,000,000 ($500). This loan will provide enough water for the family, reduce some expenses and also generate income as she sells the water to other villagers. Mrs. Doch wants to increase her income by raising some piglets with her generated income.

loans.use: to dig a well in her yard.

loans.name: Norlyn

texts.en:
