Sus ventas las hace diariamente y sus compras también, posee una clientela que lo reconoce y que ya le hace encargos, pues identifica la calidad de las frutas y verduras que vende Eduardo. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará zanahoria, cebollín, papa, habichuela y uvas, productos que mas vende a final de año donde las familias la consumen como insumo de los deliciosos pasteles criollos que vienen con tres carnes y con mucha verdura y porque cada uno en la familia cuenta con 12 uvas, para esperar el año nuevo con su 12 tradicionales deseos.
texts.en:
Eduardo lives with his wife and his six year old son to the southwest of the city.  With his business of selling fruits and vegetables he has managed to support his household.  Now, he wants to make it grow by infusing it with work capital.

During the times of greater commercial movement, like the end of the year, he does not have enough working capital.  This means he cannot meet his customers’ needs, which grow more every day.

His goal is to manage to have his own house.  That is why he makes an effort all of the time in order to increase the well-being of his household.

Eduardo went to school up until the eighth grade, high school.  When he formed his family he almost immediately finished this grade.  He developed this enterprising idea to support his household.  His experience dates back to over 30 years ago when he helped his mother, who also sold vegetables in a place in the center of the city.

He makes his purchases and sales every day.  He has a customer base that knows him and places orders with him.  They recognize the quality of the fruits and vegetables that Eduardo sells.

He is currently requesting a Kiva loan, his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will use the loan to buy carrots, scallions, potatoes, beans, and grapes.  These are the products that sell the most at the end of the year.  The families use them as ingredients for the delicious Creole pastries that come with three meats and a lot of vegetables.  Also, each member of the family has 12 grapes to await the New Year with their 12 traditional wishes.

loans.use: to buy carrots, scallions, potatoes, beans, and grapes.

loans.name: Bela

texts.en:
Bela is 38 years old. She lives in the village of Pkhvenisi with her family: her husband Yuri and two sons (17 and 16 years old). The children go to school. Bela and Yuri are leading the agro-business of the family. They have 1 hectare of land where cherry, peach and apple trees are grown. Also they grow tomatoes and garlic. Along with the above-mentioned, the family has two milk cows. They produce cheese. 

Bela and Yuri take their harvest, as well as cheese, on their mini-bus to neighborhood villages to sell. Also in winter and spring seasons they purchase fruits and vegetables on the wholesale market and sell them in the same villages. 

Bela requested credit for purchasing fruit and vegetables for resale. For New Year the demand for fruit and vegetables increases and Bela will sell more stuff than she usually does. She will get good income. She plans to save it for house renovation in the spring, as their house is already old and in bad condition.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Bokk Jomm Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité est composé de 15 femmes qui sont toutes issues de la même localité. Elles se sont organisées par affinité et par voisinage. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce

Madame Coumba est une femme marié âgée de 44 ans et mère de 7 enfants . Elle est membre du BV depuis le premier cycle et fait parti du groupe de solidarité Bokk jomm. Elle EST  debout à l extrême gauche de la photo.

Coumba pratique le commerce de céréales une activité qu elle maitrise bien pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis longtemps.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'acheter du mil des arachides pour renforcer son activité.

Son objectif est de venir en aide à ses enfants dans la prise en charge scolaire et sanitaire mais également  renforcer ses épargnes au niveau du BV.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 15 women who come from the same village. They got together based on personal affinities and neighborhood. Their main business is retailing.

Mrs. Coumba, age 44, is married and the mother of seven children. She's been a member of the Banc Villageois since her first loan, and is part of Bokk Jomm Group. She's standing on the far left in the photograph.

Coumba sells cereals, a business she masters due to the fact that she's been running it for a long time. Her new loan will enable her to buy millet and peanuts, in order to bolster her business.

Her goal is to help her children in taking care of the school and healthcare expenses, but also to bolster her savings at the Banc Villageois.

loans.use: to buy millet and peanuts

loans.name: Kakhaber

texts.en:
Kakhaber lives in the village of Gomi, East Georgia, with his family: his wife Lela, three children (15, 11 and 9 years old) and his mother (retired). The children go to school. Kakhaber and Lela earn their living through agricultural business. They have a milk cow. Lela produces cheese and sells it in Khashuri (a nearby town). Also the family grows beans and potatoes, most of which is sold on the same market. Also, Kakhaber runs a small poultry farm. He purchases chickens, raises them and sells them after 50 days. The total average monthly income of the family is 470 Laris. 

With the requested credit Kakhaber will purchase 500 chickens for 1,20 Laris each and the rest of the credit will be used for purchasing feed for them. After selling the chickens Kakhaber will get income, which will be used for his children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and feed for them.

loans.name: Sope Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé le 24 août 2010 est composé de femmes qui sont issues de la même localité. Elles ont solidairement composé leur groupe par affinité et par voisinage. Leur activité principal est le petit commerce.

Mame Bousso est une femme âgée de 56 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Elle est responsable du groupe. Elle est debout à gauche de la photo.

Mame bousso fait du commerce d habits prêt à porter depuis longtemps  c'est pour quoi elle dispose d une bonne expérience.

Avec son nouveau crédit elle va acheter des habits de bébé qu'elle va revendre au niveau de son quartier.

Son objectif est d'aider son mari (qui ne travaille plus) dans la gestion de la famille.( achat riz huile sucre lait ...)
texts.en:
This group was established on August 24, 2010, and is made up of women who come from the same neighborhood. They created their solidarity group based on their personal affinities and neighborhood. Their main business is retail.

Mrs. Bousso, age 56, is married and the mother of three children. She's responsible for the group, and is standing on the left in the photograph.

She's been selling ready-to-wear clothing for a long time, which is why she has a very good experience in this field.

With her new loan, she will buy baby clothing to resell in her neighborhood. Her goal is to help her husband (who doesn't work anymore) in supporting the family.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear clothing

loans.name: Jubbo Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 14 femmes de la même localité. Elles ont solidairement organisé leur groupe par affinité et par voisinage. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Khady est une femme âgée de 30 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis son inauguration et elle appartient au groupe de solidarité Jubbo qu'elle dirige.
Elle debout à l extrême gauche de la photo.

Elle pratique le commerce par la vente de chaussures et d'encens. Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans son domaine pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis plusieurs années.

Elle a bénéficié d'un nouveau crédit qui lui permettra d'acheter de la marchandise (chaussures encens).

A l'aide de ses bénéfices elle va aider son mari dans la gestion des besoins alimentaires et scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 14 women from the same village. They organized their solidarity group based on personal affinities and neighborhood ties. Their main business is retail.

Khady, age 30, is married and the mother of three children. She's been a member of the Banc Villageois since its inauguration. She's a member and the leader of solidarity group Jubbo. She's standing on the far-left in the photograph.

She sells shoes and incense. She has a good experience in her domain, due to the fact that she's been running this business for several years.

She obtained a new loan that will help her buy new supplies (shoes, incense). With her profits, she will help her husband take care of the food and school expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy shoes and incense

loans.name: Bouko Sapali Group

texts.fr:
ce groupe est composé de 13 femmes qui sont toutes de la même localité. Elles ont solidairement organisé leur groupe par affinité et par voisinage. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce

Fatou est âgée de 39 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de6 enfants.Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis 24/08/2010, elle fait parti du groupe de solidarité Bouko sapali dont elle est responsable. Elle est debout à gauche de la photo.

Fatou fait du commerce dans la vente de pâte d'arachide et de l'huile de palme, elle maitrise bien son activité pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis longtemps.

Grâce à son nouveau crédit elle va acheter de la marchandise (pâte d'arachide et huile de palme)

Fatou va aider son mari dans la gestion de la famille en payant la scolarité d'un de ses enfants qui suit actuellement une formation professionnelle.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 13 women who are all from the same town. The group has been jointly set up by friends and neighbors. Their main activity is small-sized trading businesses.

Fatou is 39 years old, married and mother to six children. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois since 24th April 2010 and belongs to the Bouko Sapali group, which she is also in charge of. She is standing on the left of the photo.

Fatou sells groundnut paste and palm oil, and masters her business well since she has been carrying out for a long time. Thanks to her new loan she is going to buy new stock (groundnut past and palm oil). She is going to help her husband to take care of the family by paying for the schooling of one of her children, who is currently pursuing a professional training.

loans.use: to buy groundnut paste and palm oil

loans.name: Khatia

texts.en:
Khatia is 27 years old. She lives in the village Dirbi with her family: Her husband – Davit, her 7 year old son, and her parent-in-laws. Khatia and Davit earn a living through agricultural activities. They have a milk cow and sell on average 15 kg of cheese per month.  Also they have one hectare of land, where potatoes, strawberries, barley, haricot and maize are grown. Harvested products are sold locally. Khatia’s father in law owns a mini-bus. He works on the Dirbi – Gori line. The family's total average monthly income is 1200 Laris. 

Khatia requested credit to purchase potatoes to plant in her plot. Khatia hopes that after sowing high-quality potatoes, the family will get a good harvest, which will be sold for a convenient price and the family will get the income they planned for. Khatia plans to use the income to purchase necessary household goods and to improve the family member's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes for planting.

loans.name: Mamuka

texts.en:
Mamuka is 43 years old. He is married and lives in the village of Kindzati with his family: his wife Dinara, three children (16, 15 and 13 years old) and his mother. Dinara works as a teacher in the village. Mamuka earns his living through agricultural activities. In particular, he runs a small dairy farm with three milk cows. 

Mamuka produces cheese and sells it at Khashuri (nearby town) market. Also the family owns 2 hectares of land, where maize, haricots, garlic, onions and beets are grown. Harvested products are sold on the same market. The total average monthly income of the family is 846 Laris, including the monthly pension of Mamuka’s mother. 

Mamuka requested credit for purchasing a milk cow. He will get more milk for cheese production and the sale of cheese will increase. The income of the family will grow and the family will be able to spend more on satisfying their needs. It will improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Roger

texts.es: El sr. Roger, es agricultor nacido en la localidad de Valle grande, casado con la Sra. María, ella es ama de casa, tienen 4 hijos que se encuentran estudiando y en sus momentos libres le ayudan a su papa en la siembra y cosecha de sus productos, el Sr. Roger  hace 25 años que cuentan con una parcela distante a 20km de el Torno, donde viven y trabajan agricultura conjuntamente con su familia, se dedica a la siembra de : maíz , maní, sandia y también se dedican a la ganadería, el sr. Roger ha venido trabajando hace cuatro secuencias   únicamente con emprender por lo cual se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo brindado, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de semillas par el sembradío de maiz y el preparado de la tierra para lo que implica el sembrado, una ves cosechado lo comercializa en el mercado de la zona directamente del productor al consumidor.
texts.en: Roger is a farmer who was born in Valle Grande. He is married to María, who is a housewife. They have 4 children who are students and who, in their free time, help their father to sow and harvest his crops. For 25 years, Roger has had a parcel of land 20km from El Torno where he lives and works as a farmer along with his family. He grows: corn, peanuts, and watermelon and he also raises livestock. Roger has been working with the community bank for only 4 loan sequences and he is very grateful for the support offered to him. He will use the money from the loan to buy seeds to plant corn and prepare the land for sowing. Once the crop is harvested, he will sell it in the local market directly to the consumers.

loans.use: to harvest corn and peanuts

loans.name: Dario De Jesus

texts.es:
Darío a sus 42 años de edad, trabajador incansable que sueña con darles a su esposa y cuatro hijos menores de edad un mejor nivel de vida y educación, comenzó a generar ingresos a través de actividades de producción agropecuaria en el municipio de Cocorná en Antioquia.

Con el crédito solicitado el espera poder adquirir cerdos para cebarlos, y continuar con su labor agropecuaria.

Su mayor sueño es generar una mayor dinámica agropecuaria que le asegure ingresos constantes.

El es un ser humano muy feliz, que le da gracias a Dios por la oportunidad que le ha dado de poder trabajar honestamente, y de tener a su familia como apoyo y respaldo.
texts.en:
Darío, at his 42 years, is a tireless worker who dreams of giving his wife and four dependent children a better quality of life and education.  He began to generate income in livestock production in the municipality of Cocorná in Antioquia.

With the requested loan, Darío hopes to acquire pigs to fatten and to continue his work with livestock.

Darío's greatest dream is to generate enough growth in his livestock to ensure a constant income.

Darío is a happy man who gives thanks to god for the opportunity to work honestly and to have his family's support and backing.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Nikoloz

texts.en:
Nikoloz is a 38-year-old farmer. He lives in the village of Nabakhtevi with his family: his wife Marine and three children (10, 8 and 5 years old). The children go to school. Nikoloz and Marine are busy with family agricultural business. In particular, they have three milk cows. Marine produces cheese. Also they own 4 hectares of land, which is used for wheat, maize and haricot growing. They sell harvested products, as well as home-made cheese locally. 

Nikoloz requested credit for purchasing a mini-bus, which will be used for selling their products. Nikoloz will be able to sell products in nearby villages for a higher price. Also, when he has a mini-bus he will sell additional greengrocery products, purchased from neighboring farmers. The income of the family will significantly increase and they will be able to spend more on their children’s education, as well as purchasing other household goods to improve the family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a mini-bus to use for selling greengrocery products.

loans.name: Jhon Sabastian

texts.es: A sus 19 años, el joven Jhon Sebastián se dedica desde hace dos años junto con su padre a la distribución de frutas y verduras a las tiendas y mini mercados del sector norte de la ciudad de Medellín en un vehículo particular de su padre todos los días desde las 4:00 a.m hasta las 12 del medio día. Gracias a esta actividad puede generar los ingresos para su familia y sostenimiento propio. Actualmente, el vehículo de distribución de los productos se encuentra con fallas mecánicas, por lo cual el joven Jhon Sebastián necesita del arreglo del motor del carro y comprar surtido para poder continuar con el negocio familiar. El sueño del joven Jhon Sebastián es poder estudiar y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en: For two years, 19-year-old Jhon Sebastián has been working with his father, delivering fruit and vegetables to stores and mini-marts in the northern sector of the city of Medellín.  He works with his father's private vehicle, every day from 4.00am to 12.00pm midday.  Thanks to this business, he is able to make income for his family and support himself.  The vehicle that he uses for his deliveries has some mechanical problems and Jhon Sebastián needs to fix the engine and buy some stock so that he can continue his family business.  Young Jhon Sebastián's dream is to study and get his family ahead in life.

loans.use: to fix his car's engine and to buy fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Velmys Patricia

texts.es:
Velmys, vive con sus padres, es madre soltera de una niña de 4 años de edad, ellos como familia son agricultores, Velmys colabora en las siembras, aprendió el trabajo por sus padres, tiene 10 años de estar en el trabajo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales agrícolas, abono, herbicidas, para iniciar el proceso de la siembra, con el dinero de este préstamo podrá realizar la compra de estos materiales y tener una buena productividad.
El objetivo de Velmys es colaborar con sus padres, dándoles  el apoyo con el préstamo para realizar la nueva siembra.
texts.en:
Velmys lives with her parents and is a single mother with a 4 year old little girl. The family are farmers and Velmys sows the plants. She learned the work from her parents and has been doing this for 10 years.
She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies, fertilizer, and herbicides to start the sowing process. With the money from this loan, she will be able to buy these things and have good productivity.
Velmys' goal is to work with her parents, giving them support from the loan to sow for the new season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Maria Rubiela

texts.es: La señora Maria Rubiela tiene 51 años de edad y se ha visto en la obligación de trabajar desde que su esposo murió y quedo a cargo de sus 3 hijos. Maria Rubiela se dedica principalmente a la venta de ropa para mujer como blusas, pantalones, zapatos, accesorios, entre otros. Siempre ha soñado con establecer un punto de venta para la venta de su mercancía en el municipio de San Rafael al oriente de Antioquia, y lograr que sus ingresos aumenten para poderles brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus 3 hijos. Quiere que sus hijos estudien y por eso trabaja fuertemente todos los días en busca de que sus ventas le generen ingresos que le permitan acudir a buenos institutos de estudio. Maria Rubiela, en la búsqueda del crecimiento de su negocio, requiere de la compra de mercancía que le permita tener mayor variedad para ofrecerle a sus clientes, y de este modo, aumentar su nivel de ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria Rubiela is 51 years old and has had the obligation of working since her husband died and left her with 3 children. Maria Rubiela works mainly selling clothing for women such as blouses, pants, shoes, accessories, and other things. 

She has always dreamed of establishing her own store to sell her merchandise in the town of San Rafael to the east of Antioquia, to successfully increase her income in order to be able to give a better quality of life to her 3 children.

She wants her children to be educated and this is why she works so hard every day in search of sales, to bring in enough income to allow them to attend good schools.

Maria Rubiela, in search of a way to increase her business, wants to buy merchandise that will permit her to have a better variety to offer her clients so that she can increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Rigoberto Antonio

texts.es:
Rigoberto, vive con su esposa y tienen 4 hijos, tienen casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura, lleva 20 años de estar en este oficio, pues inicio muy joven a sembrar maíz y frijol, esta actividad es la que le permitido a Rigoberto mantener su familia.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono y herbicidas, para iniciar la siembra de maíz, con este préstamo podrá mantener en el tiempo justo los insumos que necesita para que su cultivo sea fortalecido.
La aspiración de él es que la producción sea abundante y de calidad, para tener buenas ventas y así mejorar los ingresos a la familia.
texts.en:
Rigoberto lives with his wife and they have 4 children and own their own house. He is a farmer, and has been farming for 20 years. He began to grow corn and beans when he was very young, and this is what enables Rigoberto to support his family.
He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides so that he can sow his corn. This loan will let him get the supplies he needs for a good crop at just the right time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Hugo Ernesto

texts.es:
Hugo, vive con su esposa y dos hijos los cuales están estudiando, uno tiene 5 años y el otro 7 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta de desinfectante, el cual produce y distribuye en las alcaldías de la zona, este negocio lo aprendió en su familia hace 20 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la reparación del vehículo, ya que este le permite trasladar su mercadería a los clientes, por lo mismo necesita comprarse repuestos y pago de mecánico para mantener en buenas condiciones el vehículo. 
Su aspiración es mantener su carro en buenas condiciones y así mejorar la distribución de producto.
texts.en:
Hugo lives with his wife and 2 school-age children who are 5 and 7. He works selling disinfectant, which he produces and distributes to the villages in the area. He learned this business from his family 20 years ago.
He is currently requesting a loan to repair his vehicle, as this enables him to transport his merchandise to his clients. For the same reason, he needs to buy some spare parts and pay the mechanic to keep his vehicle in good condition.
His goal is to keep his car in good condition and so improve the distribution of his product.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: El señor Miguel vive en la localidad de la Guardia perteneciente al municipio de el Torno, desde hace mas de 20 años, el cual vive con su esposa Faustina quien es profesora que enseña en una escuela de la zona. El señor Miguel se dedica a la venta de madera  aproximadamente desde  hace 12 años. El señor Miguel  quiere el préstamo para la compra de madera. El esta agradecido con el préstamo que emprender le esta brindando ya que con el dinero comprar madera por cantidad y después poder venderla a distintas carpinterías ya que tiene pedidos que entregar el Sr. Miguel es una persona muy amable que se esfuerza para salir adelante por el bienestar de toda su familia.
texts.en: Señor Miguel has lived in the town of La Guardia, belonging to the El Torno municipality, for over 20 years. He lives with his wife, Faustina, who works as a teacher at one of the local schools. Miguel has sold wood for about 12 years. He would like to have this loan for the purchase of wood. He is grateful to have this loan from Emprender, since he will use it to buy a large quantity of wood and sell it to various carpenters; he has orders to fill. Miguel is a very kind person who works hard to succeed for the well-being of his entire family.

loans.use: to buy wood wholesale.

loans.name: Ana Fidelia

texts.es:
Ana, vive en casa propia, con su esposo y sus hijos quienes están estudiando, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, tiene 8 años de experiencia, aprendió cuando era joven junto a sus padres, su esposo y sus hijos le ayudan a atender estas actividades.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de concentrado, maíz y seis cerdos pequeños, para engordar, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar   la granja e incrementarla.
El objetivo de Ana es fortalecer su negocio, con la ayuda y por medio de los préstamos, para ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Ana lives in her own home with her husband and their children who are studying.  She raises pigs, has 8 years of experience, which she learned when she was young with her parents, her husband and their children help her with these activities. Currently she is applying for a loan to buy feed, corn and six small pigs for fattening.  This investment will help to improve the farm and grow it. Ana’s objective is to strengthen her business, with help and through loans, to offer a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy feed, corn and six small pigs.

loans.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is a young farmer from the village of Akhaldaba, East Georgia. He married couple of months ago and lives in the village with his wife Mariam and his mother. The only source of the income for the family is their agricultural business. In particular, the family owns a small dairy farm with two milk cows. Roman’s mother produces cheese, which is sold locally in the village. Also the family owns 0.8 hectare of land, where cabbage, haricots, beets and carrots are grown. Roman sells harvested vegetables on the local market as well. The total average monthly income of the family is 300 Laris. 

Roman requested credit for cultivation of the land and purchasing wheat for sowing. After proper cultivation of the land the family will get a good harvest of wheat next year and sell it for a reasonable price. They will get planned income, which will be used for financing family’s daily needs.

loans.use: to hire a tractor for land cultivation and purchase wheat for sowing.

loans.name: Vilma Esperanza

texts.es:
Vilma, vive con su esposo y dos hijos en casa familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de lotería hace ocho años desempeña este oficio y lo inicio debido a la necesidad y por la falta de empleo todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar más series de lotería y de esa forma tener lo suficiente para ofrecerles a sus clientes y aumentar en sus ingresos  solo de esa forma podrá ayudar a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
El objetivo de Vilma es tener mejores ingresos económicos y cada día aumentar en clientes y siempre mantener el negocio estable.
texts.en:
Vilma lives with her husband and two children in the family home. She has been selling lottery tickets for eight years. She began this livelihood due to necessity, and the lack of employment, and carries it out every day from Monday to Sunday.

She needs the loan to buy more lottery ticket series, so that she has enough to sell to her customers, and increase her income. Only in that way will she be able to help her family with the household expenses. 

Vilma's objective is to have a better income, increase her clientele every day, and always maintain a stable business.

loans.use: To buy more lottery ticket series to sell.

loans.name: Lelys Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Lelys del Carmen a sus 36 años se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir femeninas desde hace tres años en compañía de una vecina y una cuñada. Gracias a esta actividad consigue los ingresos necesarios para ella y su hija de 9 años. Con el ánimo de sacar una nueva línea de ropa interior para dama y niña, la señora Lelys necesita de la compra de insumos tales como telas, hilos y resortes con lo cual pueda cumplir su sueño. A futuro espera tener un taller más grande en el cual pueda generar varios empleos directos y mejorar la calidad de vida de hija.
texts.en:
Lelys del Carmen at age 36 has been making women’s clothing for three years with a neighbor and a sister-in-law. Thanks to this work she gets the necessary income for herself and her 9 year old daughter. 

With the idea of making a new line of undergarments for ladies and girls, Lelys needs to buy supplies such as fabric, thread, and elastic with which she can fulfill her dream. 

In the future she hopes to have a larger workshop to create more direct jobs and to improve the quality of life for her daughter.

loans.use: o buy supplies such as fabric, thread, and patterns

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia, ella por muchos años se dedica a vender productos de perfumería de revistas de la Avon, y lo reparte entre sus clientes  trabaja de esa forma no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar dos pedidos de mercadería debido a esta época navideña y mejorara  sus ingresos y de esa forma podrá obtener lo necesario para ayudarle a su familia.
El objetivo de Cristina es mantener siempre su negocio y con el tiempo tener más productos de mayor venta y variedad  para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristina lives with her husband and children in her own house. For many years, she has made a living selling perfume products from Avon magazines. She distributes them to her customers. This kind of job does not have a fixed schedule. 

She needs the loan to buy two orders of merchandise for the holiday season and to improve her income. In this way, she can get what she needs to help her family.

Cristina's goal is to always keep her business going and, with time, to have more varied, wholesale products for her customers.

loans.use: to buy perfume and cologne.

loans.name: Maria De Las Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Maria de las Mercedes a sus 51 años, depende del cultivo de tomates y hortalizas que aprendió a hacer por sus padres y su familia. De esta actividad a podido pagar los gastos que le genera el hogar en el cual vive con sus 2 hijos. La señora Maria tiene toda su fe puesta en el cultivo de estos tomates y hortalizas para sacar a sus hijos adelante y brindarles el estudio que necesitan, sin embargo, las fuertes lluvias han amenazado con destruir los plásticos con los que cubre sus cultivos de la misma, lo que ha producido que algunos de sus cultivos se pierdan y otros no salgan de muy buena calidad. En la búsqueda de que su cultivo salga adelante, la señora Maria de las Mercedes necesita adquirir unos nuevos plásticos que impidan el ingreso de la lluvia y protejan sus cultivos para poder que salgan de buena calidad y poderlos vender a un buen precio.
texts.en:
Maria de las Mercedes at her 51 years of age depends on growing tomatoes and vegetables, which she learned to do from her parents and relatives. This work pays the household expenses where she lives with her two children. 

Maria has all her faith in growing these tomatoes and vegetables as a way for moving her children forward and providing them with the education they need. 

However, the strong rains have threatened to destroy the plastic covering she uses to cover her plants and so some of them have been lost and others have not been of very good quality. 

In search of a way to have a good crop, Maria de las Mercedes needs to buy some new plastic to prevent the entry of rain and to protect her plants so that she can have a good quality crop and sell them at a good price.

loans.use: to buy a plastic awning to cover her plants from the rain

loans.name: Maria Noelia

texts.es:
Maria Noelia a sus 49 años de edad busca sacar adelante a su único hijo de 8 años, el cual es la luz de sus ojos!

Ella comenzó elaborando tejidos a mano, y luego, buscando un mejor futuro para ella y su pequeño se lanzo a comercializarlos desde su propio almacén, el cual se encuentra ubicado en un pequeño local del centro comercial La Fe en el Retiro – Antioquia desde hace ya 7 años.

Buscando diversificar su oferta a los clientes, y tener ingresos más constantes, comenzó a comercializar en su punto de venta artesanías también, lo cual poco a poco fue atrayendo nuevo público.

Con el crédito ella quiere comprar nuevo surtido para su almacén y algunos otros insumos, ya que sabe que en esta época del año llegan algunos turistas a la región que se ven interesados en llevarse algún recuerdito de su paseo.

Ella sueña con tener un almacén cada vez más grande y con surtido más diverso que le permita interesar a todo aquel que pase por el frente de su local.
texts.en:
Maria Noelia is 49 years old and is looking to provide for her only son who is 8 years old, and who is the light of her eyes!

She began making handmade weavings, and later, searching for a better future for herself and her little one, she launched into business with her own clothing shop, which can be found in a little place in the commercial center La Fe en el Retiro, in Antioquia, and she has been there 7 years.

Wanting to diversify her inventory for her clients, and have more steady income, she began selling handicrafts as well, which little by little have been attracting new customers.

With the money from this loan she wants to buy new inventory for her store and some other supplies, as she knows that at this time of the year the tourists visit the region and they are interested in taking back some little souvenir of their trip.

She dreams of having a store that continues to grow and have a more diverse selection that will interest everyone that passes in front of her store.

loans.use: to buy inventory and supplies for her clothing and handicraft store

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 48 años es una mujer emprendedora. Forjo su familia, junto a sus 6 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con 2 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampas.  Hace algunos años se separó de su esposo; desde entonces afrontó las responsabilidades de la familia. Esto le ayudó para convertirla en una mujer independiente. Es así que apertura, desde hace 15 años, un restaurante turístico; en una zona céntrica de su localidad, donde brinda todo tipo de alimentos a profesores, trabajadores de las entidades bancarias, abogados y doctores; que por motivo de trabajo radican en Pampas. Cuenta que recibe como mínimo 30 personas diarias. Pues ya tiene clientes fijos. Además, su secreto es preparar sus alimentos con los vegetales que ella misma siembra. Porque Anita, también tiene terrenos agrícolas, donde labra, en asociación con otra señora, ya que la mayor parte de su tiempo lo dedica a su restaurante. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los pétalos” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde está muy contenta pues tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Ana, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de variedad de productos y carne para la preparación de los ricos platos de comida que vende.
texts.en:
Ana, age 48, is an enterprising woman. She has raised a family of 6 children.  She lives with 2 of them in her own house, located in the community of Pampas.  She has been separated from her husband for some years and since then has faced the responsibility for her family.  This helped her to change into an independent woman.

This is why, 15 years ago, she opened a restaurant in the center of her community.  There, she offers all types of food to professors, workers in banks, lawyers, and doctors who, for purposes of work, find themselves in Pampas.  She tells us that she serves a minimum of 30 people a day since she already has an established clientele.  Moreover, her secret is preparing her dishes with vegetables she plants herself.  Ana also has agricultural land where she works along with another woman since she dedicates most of her time to her restaurant.

Ana belongs to the “los pétalos” (flower petals) solidarity group.  This is her seventh loan with MFP.  She is very happy because she has financial support and, thus, will feel secure about moving forward with her business.  In addition, she promises to pay her installments.  She is thankful to be part of her solidarity group because all its members are responsible and supportive people.  Upon receiving her loan, Ana will invest the money applied for in the purchase of products and meat for the preparation of the tasty meals she sells.

loans.use: to purchase meat and other products for the food she sells

loans.name: Sara Esmeralda

texts.es:
Sara, vive con sus dos hijos en casa familiar, ella tiene su negocio de productos básicos como: aceite, azúcar, sopas instantáneas, café instantáneo, jabón, champoo, ya tiene un año de tenerlo en su casa y debido a la demanda de sus clientes todos los días trabaja de lunes a domingo, no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo utilizara para mejorar su inventario y comprar los productos de primera necesidad como: jabón, detergentes, lejía, frijoles, azúcar, de esa forma podrá mejorar sus ganancias y tener más clientes.
El sueño de Sara es mantener siempre estable su negocio y cada día ir creciendo para ofrecerles variedad a sus clientes y  que su familia vivan en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Sara lives with her two sons in their own home. There she has a grocery store where she sells basic items such as oil, sugar, instant soups, instant coffee soap, and shampoo. She has had this grocery store for a year now and due to client's demands she works Monday through Sunday. She does not have a schedule of set working hours.

She will use the loan to increase inventory and purchase basic products such as soap, detergent, bleach, beans, and sugar to increase profits and have more clients.

Her dream is to maintain a stable business, expand it every day to offer clients better variety, and for her family to live in better conditions.

loans.use: buy soap, detergent, beans, sugar.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Sabina, de 38 años es una madre, soltera; trabajadora y valiente. Vive al lado de sus 3 hijos, a los que cuidan en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la localidad de San Carlos. “tengo que trabajar el doble”, afirma. Pues sus hijos, ya son jóvenes y desea brindarles una buena educación; “quiero que sean profesionales”, concluye. Por ello todos los días, cuida sus sembríos de papa, alverja, maíz, cebada y trigo; que comercializa en la feria de Pampas y en Huancayo, dependiendo de la cantidad de su cosecha. Además de la crianza de animales como toros, ovejas, gallinas y cuyes; que comercializa después de engordarlos. Pero como ella es una mujer que no descansa. Trabaja por las noches en un restaurante de venta de caldos, donde le pagan 15 soles diarios; con ello puede solventar algunos gastos. De igual manera los fines de semana, lava ropa ajena. “Tengo que trabajar en todo lo que pueda”, afirma. Ya que su intención es cumplir su objetivo. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “San Carlos” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde está muy contenta pues tendrá, apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Sabina, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de maíz y alverja. Además comprará 2 ovejas para incrementar su ganado.
texts.en:
Sabina, 38 years old, is a single mother. She is hard-working and courageous. She lives with her 3 children, whom she looks after in a rented house, located in the municipality of San Carlos. "I have to work double" she states. As her children are young she wishes to grant them a good education; "I want them to be professionals" she concludes. So, every day she looks after her crops of potato, peas, corn, barley and wheat, which she sells in the markets of Pampas and Huancayo, depending on the quantity of the harvest.

Apart from this, she raises animals such as bulls, sheep, chicken and guinea pigs, which she sells after fattening them up. As she is a woman who does not rest she works in the evenings in a soup restaurant. They pay her 15 PEN per day, with which she can pay some bills. In the same way she works at the weekends washing peoples' clothes. "I have to work in anything I can" she says, as her intention is to fulfil her objectives. She belongs to the solidarity group "San Carlos" and this is her eighth loan with MFP, where she is very happy as she will have financial support and will therefore feel sure about moving on with her business. On the other hand she promises to comply with her quota payments. Furthermore, she likes to be part of her association because all of its members are responsible, supportive people.

Sabina, on receiving support; will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizers to spread amongst her corn and pea crops. Furthermore she will buy 2 sheep to increase her livestock.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and two sheep.

loans.name: Apolinario

texts.es:
Apolinario, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos y nietos, él trabaja la agricultura, esta actividad la aprendió muy joven con sus padres, pero ha sido el medio para subsistir y desarrollar a su familia, no tiene un horario fijo.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de de insumos agrícolas como, abono y los herbicidas, esta compra le ayudara para iniciar en el tiempo correcto dándole a los cultivos el cuido necesario.
Él quiere tener éxito en sus siembras, ya que de los cultivos depende para apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Apolinario lives with his wife, two sons, and grandchildren. He is a farmer. He learned how to farm at a very young age with his parents and this work has allowed him to provide for and develop his family. He does not have a set working schedule.

He is requesting the loan to buy supplies such as fertilizer and pesticides. This will allow him to start growing crops in the right season in order to better maintain them.

He wants to be successful with his crops since he depends on them to provide for his family.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Tomas Antonio

texts.es:
Tomas, vive con su familia, su esposa y su hijo,  ellos dependen de él, su ocupación es la siembra de maíz,  inicio hace varios años con esta actividad como un medio para tener ingresos.
Actualmente está iniciando el proceso con la tierra para cultivar, por lo que solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en abono, herbicidas para aplicarlos al cultivo.
El objetivo de Tomas es que a través del préstamo pueda mejorar las cosechas, dando así una mejor condición a su familia, teniendo el alimento que necesitan.
texts.en:
Tomas lives with his family: his wife and son who depend on him. He grows corn for a living and he began this job years back to make money.

At the moment, he is beginning to cultivate the land and is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides to put on the crop.

Tomas' objective is to improve the crop's conditions through this loan so he can offer his family a better quality of life by giving them the food they need.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Zulma

texts.es: Zulma  de 43 años  vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y se dedica al comercio de mercancía variada como ropa, calzado, perfumes y accesorios para damas y caballeros. Ella inició su negocio para lograr independencia económica y sacar adelante a su familia, inicialmente utilizó un capital pequeño, pero gradualmente fue reinvirtiendo y poco a poco fue ganando nuevos clientes  con los que amplió su mercado y así mismo diversificó sus productos y vender todo lo que sus compradores le encargan. En la actualidad tiene 2 años de estar vinculada a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la cual ha desarrollado su microempresa y ha conseguido fortalecer su clientela,  porque con sus créditos  logra exhibir un surtido, tal como ellos  lo requiere y de manera oportuna. Su mayor desafío es tener el capital suficiente para complacer a su clientela que cada día crece; esta es justamente la razón por la que acude a su credikiva, tercer financiamiento que hace a esta organización y con el cual comprará ropa para damas y caballeros , para que estos vistan elegantes para recibir el nuevo 2012 y todo con la mercancia que les consigue Zulma a un muy buen precio.
texts.en: Zulma is 43 years old, lives in the city of Cartagena, and sells items such as clothes, shoes, perfumes, and men's and women's accessories. She began her business to gain economic independence and maintain her family. In the beginning, she had a small amount of resources, but little by little she reinvested in her business and gained new customers. This allowed her to expand her market, offer a large array of products, and sell everything her clients ordered. At the moment, she has been a part of the Mario Santo Domindo Foundation for two years. With this organization, she developed her small business and has solidified her clientele. With her loans she is able to exhibit an assortment of products as is required and in a favorable manner. Her biggest obstacle is having enough merchandise to please her clientele which grows daily. This is why she is requesting Kiva for her third loan, through this organization, to buy men's and women's clothing so her clients can dress elegantly to welcome 2012 at Zulma's reasonable prices.

loans.use: women and men's clothing.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es:
Herminia, administra una tienda de consumo, actualmente vive sola, solamente atendiendo las actividades domesticas y la tienda pues sus clientes llegan a toda hora a realizarle compras.
Actualmente Herminia está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos de la canasta básica para surtir la tienda, como el aceite, frijol, arroz, galletas, dulces, boquitas, pollo, huevos, entre otros mas que se puedan mencionar, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar el negocio y contar con mayor preferencia de los clientes.
Su aspiración es tener una negocio estable, por medio de los prestamos poder crecer y mejorar su disponibilidad económica.
texts.en:
Herminia runs a grocery store. Currently she lives alone, only looking after the household chores and the store. Her customers arrive at all hours to make purchases. 

At this time, Herminia is applying for a loan to buy basic household necessities for stocking her store, such as cooking oil, beans, rice, cookies, candy, snacks, chicken, eggs, and other things that could be mentioned.

This investment will help her improve her business and attract more customers. Her ambition is to have a stable business, and by means of the loans, to grow, and improve her financial situation.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, beans, rice, cookies, candy, snacks, chicken, and eggs.

loans.name: Dimitri

texts.en:
Dimitri is 26 years old. He lives in the village of Misaktsieli with his family: his wife Lia, their 3-year-old daughter, and his parents. He is employed as a worker in the village. Also, he helps his parents in their dairy farm with one milk cow. They produce cheese and sell it locally. The total average monthly income of the family is 600 Laris. 

Dimitri requested credit for purchasing an additional milk cow. The family will produce and sell double the amount of cheese and increase their income. Part of the increased income will be reinvested in further development of the family farm and the rest will be used for the family’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Bernita

texts.es: Bernita, de 39 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en concubinato con Carlos, desde hace 15 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, a los cuidan en casa de su mamá, ubicada en la ciudad de Pampas. Junto a su esposo se dedican a diversas actividades. La principal durante el año es la agricultura, tienen 10 años sembrando papa, alverja, olluco y maíz, en sus 7 parcelas de terreno agrícola. Que según cuenta, adquirió gracias a su esfuerzo y constancia. Además en cada cosecha viajan a la capital del país, a comercializar sus alimentos. Pero en temporadas de feria y festividades, realizan negocio. Que consiste en la venta de frazadas, colchones, sombreros, cucharones de madera y ollas de barro; a los diferentes caseríos de la zona, como son Salcabamba, Tayacaja, Quishuar y demás; donde ya es conocida y obtiene buenas ganancias, pues tiene clientes fijos. Ahora desea ahorrar dinero para comprar su casa propia. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “las líderes de santa anita” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está muy contenta pues tendrá, apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Bernita, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra al por mayor de frazadas, mantas típicas y ollas; para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Bernita, 39 years old, is a hard-working woman. She has been living with her partner Carlos for the last 15 years. Both have 4 children whom they look after in her mother's house, located in the city of Pampas. Together with her husband they work in various activities. The main one during the year is agriculture. They have 10 years experience planting potatoes, peas, ulluco and corn in their 7 agricultural plots. These they acquired thanks to their constancy and effort. 

Furthermore, with each harvest they travel to the capital of the country to market their foodstuffs. However during market days and festivities they do business which includes selling blankets, mattresses, hats, wooden spoons and clay pots to the different settlements in the area, such as Salcabamba, Tayacaja, Quishuar and others, where she is renowned and makes good profit as she has regular customers.

Now she wishes to save money to buy her own house. She belongs to the solidarity group "Las Líderes de Santa Anita" and this is her second loan with MFP where she is very happy as she will have financial support and will therefore feel sure about moving on with her business. On the other hand she promises to comply with her quota payments. Furthermore, she likes to be part of her association because all of its members are responsible, supportive people. Bernita, on receiving support; will invest the requested money in buying bedspreads, traditional blankets and pots wholesale, in order to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, blankets and pots.

loans.name: Angelina Ortez Fuentes

texts.es:
Angelina, vive con su esposo y cinco hijos de 19, 17, 14, 12, 10 años de edad, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y aves de corral, Angelina es ama de casa y a la vez dedica su tiempo para alimentar y darle mantenimiento a la granja, su esposo es agricultor, juntos ha tratado de sobrellevar su hogar.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de concentrado y reparaciones para la granja, también ocupara una parte para cancelar otra deuda pendiente. Este préstamo le ayudara a Angelina para mejorar la condición de la granja y poder estar solvente, su propósito es crecer y cada día tener nuevas oportunidades de superación.
El sueño de ella es ampliar el espacio de la granja, también poder a través de su esfuerzo superar a sus hijos en el estudio, para que tengan mejores oportunidades en el futuro.
texts.en:
Angelina lives with her husband, and five children, ages 19, 17, 14, 12, and 10.  She raises pigs and poultry. Angelina is a housewife, and devotes her time to feeding her animals and taking care of her small farm. Her husband is a farmer, and together they have tried to support their household. 

At this time, she is applying for a loan to buy concentrate and do some maintenance on her farm. She will also use a part of it to pay another outstanding debt. This loan will help Angelina to improve the condition of her farm, and to be solvent. Her aim is grow, and to have opportunities for self-improvement every day.

Her dream is to expand the size of the farm, and also through her efforts to help her children excel in their in their studies, so that they have better opportunities in the future.

loans.use: To buy concentrate, and do farm repairs.

loans.name: Natalia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Natalia a sus 26 años de edad, madre soltera, con una pequeña de tan solo 8 años de edad busca ganarle la carrera a la vida y a través de sus manos salir adelante.

Ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías, colchas de retrasos, muñecos navideños, tarjetería, entre otros productos relacionados gracias a su hermana, quien fue la que le enseño dicha labor, la cual le ha permitido generar los ingresos necesarios para mantener su hogar.

Con el préstamo solicitado ella comprara materia prima para continuar con sus labores manuales, y así poder ofrecerle a sus clientes nuevos productos.

Su gran sueño es tener un nivel de ingresos estable y suficiente, que le asegure poderle brindar educación de calidad a su hija hasta hacerla profesional.
texts.en:
Natalia is 26 years old and is a single mother, with a young daughter of just 8 years of age. She is looking to get ahead in life through the use of her hands.

She makes a living making crafts, bedspreads, Christmas dolls, postcards, amongst other related products thanks to her sister who taught her this work. This has allowed her to generate sufficient income to keep her home.

With the requested loan she will buy supplies to continue with her manual work and thus be able to offer new products to her customers.

Her greatest dream is to have a stable and sufficient income which will insure she can grant quality education to her daughter until she becomes professional.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, el se dedica al negocio de elaboración de especias junto con otros ocho empleados, el oficio lo inicio junto a su esposa todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar la mercadería para la elaboración como: cominos, achote, canela, orégano, pimienta  de esa forma podrá aumentar en sus ventas y podrá pagar a las personas que le ayudan, tambien les podrá ayudar a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
El sueño de Juan es tener el negocio más grande y tener estable siempre su negocio.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and children and is in the business of spice manufacture along with eight other employees.  He works with his wife every day from Monday to Sunday.  The loan will be used to buy merchandise for the development, such as cumin, achiote (a seed), cinnamon, oregano, and pepper.  He will be able to increase his sales and will be able to pay people to help him.  Also, it will help him help his family with household expenses.
Juan's dream is to have the biggest business and always have a stable business.

loans.use: to purchase cumin, achiote, cinnamon, oregano, pepper.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La señora Luz Marina posee un negocio de sala de belleza y venta de productos para uso personal en su casa desde hace cinco años, gracias a la ayuda de su familia quien la apoyo económica y moralmente para iniciar su negocio. Con esta actividad puede generar los ingresos suficientes para suplir sus necesidades y aportar para su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar su surtido y ventas, la señora Luz Marina necesita de la compra de nuevos productos para ofrecer a sus clientes. El sueño de la señora Luz Marina es ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus padres.
texts.en: Luz Marina has had a beauty salon business and has sold beauty products from her house for the past 5 years, thanks to the help from her family who supported her economically and morally to start her business. With this business she can generate sufficient income to supply her necessities and support her home. With the goal of bettering her selection and sales, Luz Marina needs to buy new products to offer to her clients. Luz Marina's dream is to enlarge her business and improve the quality of life of her parents.

loans.use: to buy beauty products such as perfumes and creams

loans.name: Ianeta

texts.en:
Ianeta, 45 years of age, is married and has three children. She owns and operates a small retail shop, selling a variety of different products in the local community. She has 3 years of experience in this business. Ianeta needs a loan of WST 2,000 to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 WST or US $125 per week) to improve/expand the business.

Ianeta joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.  This is Ianeta's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to buy additional products to sell

loans.name: Elsy De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Elsy, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, su negocio es una tienda,  desde hace más de 15 años de dedica a la venta de refrescos, productos de primera necesidad, pólvora, su esposo es un profesional de la carrera de derecho, desde hace tres años trabaja como abogado.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de juegos pirotécnicos (pólvora china), para las fechas de navidad y fin de año, también comprara mercadería como gaseosas, galletas, pan de barra, dulces, entre otra mercadería que es muy necesaria para atender a la clientela. 
Su aspiración es mejorar la situación económica de su familia, apoyar a su esposo para tener una mejor solvencia económica.
texts.en:
Elsy lives with her husband and two children. He business is a store. For more than 15 years she has sold soft drinks, basic necessities, and fireworks. Her husband is a law professional and has worked as a lawyer for the past three years.

She is asking for a loan to buy fireworks (Chinese gunpowder) for the Christmas and New Year holidays. She will also buy merchandise such as soft drinks, cookies, french bread, candy, and other items that are necessary to meeting her customers' needs. She aspires to improve her family's economic situation and to support her husband financially.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, cookies, bread, and candy.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es: Carmela, de 30 años es una mujer luchadora. Vive en compañía de Artemio, su esposo desde hace 6 años. Ambos tienen un hijo: Jefferson, al que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Chalampampa. Junto a su esposo se dividen las actividades que tienen que desarrollar. Su principal actividad económica es la agricultura, gracias a sus terrenos propios, que adquirieron con mucho esfuerzo, pueden sembrar papa, olluco, habas y alverja. Cuenta que en temporadas de siembra grande, alquilan terrenos para continuar con sus sembríos. Pues llevan a comercializar sus cosechas a la capital del país, donde existe mayor demanda. De igual manera, se dedican a la comercialización de ganado, como: vacas, ovejas y cerdos, los que cuida con mucho esmero; ya que depende de su peso y calidad, puede obtener mejores ganancias. Ahora su principal objetivo, es comprarse más terrenos agrícolas. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “San Carlos” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde está muy contenta pues tendrá, apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Carmela de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa y olluco.
texts.en:
Carmela, 30, is a tenacious woman.  She lives with Artemio, her husband of six years, and they have a son: Jefferson, who they care for in their own house located in Chalampampa.  She and her husband share the activities they have to carry out.  

Her main economic activity is farming.  She owns land that they acquired with much effort that they grow potatoes, olluco [a tuber], lima beans and peas on.  She relates that during seasons of large-scale planting they lease land to continue with their planting because they take their crops to the nation’s capital to sell where demand is higher.  They also are merchants of livestock like cows, sheep and pigs that she cares for with much dedication since their weight and quality depend on it and she can earn better profits.  Now, her main objective is to buy more farmland.

She belongs to the “San Carlos” communal bank and this is her 8th loan with MFP where she is very happy because she’ll have financial support and will thus feel sure to advance with her business.  She pledges to make her installment payments.  She enjoys being part of the communal bank because all the members are responsible, supportive people.  If Carmela were to receive your support, she’ll use the requested money to buy natural fertilizer to spread among her potato and olluco crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Otilia Argentina

texts.es:
Otilia, vive con su familia, es madre de una niña de 11 años, ella se dedica a la venta de meriendas y antojitos, lleva tres años en el negocio, lo atiende por las tardes de 2:00pm a 9:00pm, cuenta con muchos clientes.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de  maíz, leña y aceite, para mantener de estos materiales ya que son necesarios y se pueden obtener por bastante cantidad, para ahorrarse en la compra, esto le permitirá adelantar con su negocio.
El objetivo de ella es que su negocio crezca, innovar con nuevos productos para mejorar también la condición económica de su familia.
texts.en: Otilia lives with her family; she is the mother of an 11 year old girl.  She sells snacks and appetizers, is three years in the business, serving in the evenings from 2:00 pm to 9:00 pm, with many customers. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of corn, wood and oil, to keep these materials as they are needed, and she can obtain enough quantity to save on the purchase, it would advance her business. Her goal is that her business grows and to create new products in order to also improve the economic condition of her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn, wood and oil.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is from a small village in West Georgia. She is 53-years-old and lives with her family: husband – Tamaz and 31-years-old son. Tamaz works as a worker in the village. Irina and her son are involved in family agriculture. They have 8 milk cows and 7 calves. Irina produces various dairy products (cheese, yogurt) and sells them in Tbilisi (capital city of the country). Total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Laris. 

Irina requested credit for purchasing feed for livestock for the winter months. She will feed the livestock with high quality natural feed and get high quality milk during the winter months. Irina will sell grown calves in spring and get income. She plans to use the income for further development of family dairy farm. Also part of the income will be used for covering family daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase feed for livestock.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María, vive con dos hijos en casa propia, ella tiene un comedor en su casa donde vende desayunos y almuerzos, todos los días y por las tardes vende pupusas dos días por semana, el negocio lo inicio hace veinte años debido a la necesidad.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar la materia prima de su negocio como: quesillo, chicharrón, harina, repollo, tomates y otros materiales que le servirán para la elaboración de pupusas, teniendo lo necesario podrá obtener mejores ingresos y podrá darles lo que necesitan su familia.
El sueño de María siempre mantener su negocio y poder darles el estudio  a sus hijos y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María lives with two children in their own house.  She has a room in her house where she sells breakfast and lunch every day, and two days a week in the evenings sells pupusas (thick, corn tortillas).  She started the business twenty years ago because of the need. The loan will be used to purchase the raw materials of her business such as: cheese, pork, flour, cabbage, tomatoes and other materials that will serve to prepare pupusas.  Having what is needed can earn a better income and she can give her family what they need. María ‘s dream is always to maintain her business, be able to give her children an education and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cheese, pork, flour, cabbage and tomatoes.

loans.name: Lusia

texts.en:
Lusia is 48 years of age and is married with eight children.
Lusia owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting fruits and vegetables for sale. She has three years of experience in this business.    Lusia needs a loan of WST $2,000 to purchase additional equipment such as a wheelbarrow and weed killing chemicals. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 talas or US $83 per week) to improve and expand the business.

Lusia joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Lusia's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment needed, such as a wheelbarrow and weed killing chemicals.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es: La señora Angelina tiene 52 años y tiene dos hijos por los que trabaja fuertemente con su esposo. Se dedica a la producción y venta de arepas, actividad que hace en su casa desde el momento en que su esposo se quedó sin empleo y necesitaban una fuente de dinero para poder sostener con los gastos del hogar. Actualmente la señora Angelina ha visto como han crecido sus ventas, por lo que necesita remodelar su cocina para poder producir los pedidos que le hacen, además, de que se encuentra en un sitio donde puede haber contaminantes para su producto. Angelina sueña con que su negocio crezca de manera que pueda abrir un punto de venta y no lo tenga que producir desde su casa, y que le mejore sus ingresos con lo que pueda brindarles a sus hijos la educación que necesitan.
texts.en:
Angelina, 52, has two children that she works hard for with her husband.  She makes arepas [traditional corn griddle cake] to sell, an activity she currently does at home since her husband lost his job and they needed a source of income to cover household expenses.

Angelina has noticed how her sales have increased so she needs to remodel her kitchen so that she can fill the orders she gets.  Besides, it’s currently situated in a position where contaminants could affect her products.

Angelina dreams with her business’ growth to such an extent that she can open a sales point and not have to produce at home and that her income improves so that she can provide her children with the education they need.

loans.use: to build a new kitchen.

loans.name: Mariyei

texts.es: La señora Mariyei a sus 41 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la confección de prendas de vestir sobre medida y por encargos. Esta actividad la aprendió gracias a una amiga quien le enseño todo lo relacionado a este trabajo y desde entonces puede conseguir el sustento para ella y sus cuatro hijos de 15, 13, 11 y 9 años. Con el ánimo de producir una nueva línea de ropa de niño, la señora Mariyei necesita de la compra de insumos como telas, hilos y moldes con lo cual pueda cumplir su objetivo. La señora Mariyei sueña con tener un taller mucho más grande en el cual puede generar varios empleos directos y brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mariyei, 41, has been making clothes to order and based on prior orders for ten years.  She learned this occupation thanks to a girlfriend who taught her everything related to it and since then she’s been able to earn her livelihood for herself and her four children who are 15, 13, 11 and 9 years old.

Hoping to introduce a new line of children’s clothing, Mariyei needs to buy supplies like fabric, thread and patterns to reach her objective.  Mariyei dreams with having a much larger workshop where she can generate several direct employment opportunities and to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and patterns.

loans.name: Elinda

texts.es: Elinda, de 32 años es una mujer valiente. Pues cuida de sus 2 hijos: Franck y Luis, sola, en una casa alquilada ubicada en la localidad de Pampas. Su trabajo es singular, ya que es la única mujer que trabaja en el mantenimiento de carreteras y como peón en obras de construcción, del gobierno de su localidad. Ahí obtiene un dinero extra para su hogar, pues le pagan 15 soles diarios. Además siembra olluco y papa, desde hace 5 años en terrenos agrícolas que le heredaron sus padres, en el caserío de San Carlos, donde ella vive. En cada cosecha comercializa sus alimentos a la ciudad de Huancayo, donde aprovecha su viaje para ver a sus ovejas de buena raza, que son cuidados por su mamá, pues ella no cuenta con una casa propia, para cuidarlos. Además puede trasladar con mayor facilidad a sus ovejas a la feria agropecuaria, donde los comercializa y obtiene buenos ingresos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “San Carlos” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde está muy contenta pues tendrá, apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Elinda, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de olluco.
texts.en: Elinda, 32 years old, is a brave woman. She cares for her 2 sons, Franck and Luis, alone. She lives in a rented house in the area of Pampas. Her job is unique because she is the only woman who works in road maintenance and as a construction worker for the government in her town. In this way she earns some extra income for her household; they pay her PEN 15.00 per day. She has also been planting olluco [tuber similar to a potato] and potatoes for 5 years on agricultural land that she received from her parents in the small town of San Carlos, where she lives. At each harvest she sells her grains in the city of Huancayo, where she takes advantage of the trip to see her good sheep, which are cared for her by her mother since she doesn’t have her own house where she can care for them. Also she can transport her sheep more easily to the livestock market, where she sells them and earns good income. She belongs to the “San Carlos” communal bank and this is the eight loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She is very content because she will have financial support and will feel secure in moving ahead with her business. She also pledges to follow through with her repayments. She also likes being a part of her association because all of the members are responsible and cooperate well. Elinda, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizers to put on her olluco crop.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers

loans.name: Liliana Carolina

texts.es:
Lilian, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y tamales, vive con sus tres hijos, ella recibe ingresos únicamente de las ventas que realiza, las cuales son los días sábado y domingos por la tarde, pero solo las pupusas, ya que los tamales los realiza en los días de semana.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, tomates, condimentos, aceite, para la elaboración de las pupusas y los tamales, con esta inversión espera mejorar el negocio y aumentar las ventas.
El objetivo y sueño de Lilian es poder obtener su propia casa, donde poder ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Lilian lives with her three children. She sells pupusas and tamales and only receives income from sales made, which are Saturday and Sunday afternoons, but only the pupusas, since the tamales are made on weekdays. She requests a loan for the purchase of corn, tomatoes, spices, oil, to prepare the pupusas and tamales.  With this investment she hopes to improve business and increase sales. Lilian’s goal and dream is to get her own house, where she can offer her children a better future.

loans.use: to purchase corn, tomatoes, condiments, oil, pork, cheese.

loans.name: Cruz Elena

texts.es: La señora Cruz Elena tiene 50 años, de los cuales lleva 8 años dedicada al servicio de la confección a terceros. Con su esposo, han luchado para darle a sus 3 hijos todo lo que necesitan y poderles ofrecer la mejor educación posible. Cruz Elena sueña con brindarle a sus hijos una estabilidad económica en un futuro, y busca lograrlo a través del crecimiento de su empresa y consolidarla como un gran taller de confección; es por esto que necesita la compra de insumos para su negocio de modo que pueda realizar mas trabajos de confección a terceros y así aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida tanto de sus hijos como de su esposo.
texts.en:
Cruz Elena is 50 years old and has spent 8 of them making clothes for third parties.  With her husband they’ve struggled to provide their three children everything they need and to be able to offer them the best possible education.

Cruz Elena dreams with providing her children with economic stability in the future and seeks to attain it through the growth of her firm consolidating it into a large clothing manufacturing workshop.  Because of this, she needs to buy supplies for the business so that she can make more clothes for third parties and thus increase her income and improve the quality of life of her children and her husband.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her workshop.

loans.name: Ruth Mery

texts.es:
Ruth Mery tiene 37 años de edad vive en Nazca, Perú. La ciudad es famosa por la legendaria Líneas de Nazca, una serie de antiguos, inmenso e inexplicable geroglíficos  grabados en el desierto que rodea la ciudad, generalmente atribuidos a la cultura Nazca, que habitaron en la región de 300 a 800 AD. Como tal, la ciudad atrae a una cantidad considerable de turismo. Pero Nazca también es conocida por su gente trabajadora, que han conservado  la calma a pesar de los frecuentes terremotos, tsunamis, y un alto nivel de pobreza en la región. Ruth es conviviente, su pareja trabaja en una empresa como obrero, juntos tienen 3 hijos cuyas edades comprenden entre 12, 5 y 2 años, sus hijos de 12 y 5 años ya van a la escuela el mayor se encuentra cursando el primer año de secundaria y el segundo de ellos se encuentra cursando educación inicial, el menor de todos aun no va al colegio pero Ruth nos dice que le saca canas verdes por lo travieso que es, pero a los tres los ama muchísimo y es su motor para salir adelante cada día a pesar de los contratiempos que pueda tener.

Ruth es muy luchadora y con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación tiene 2 negocios, el primero consiste en la venta de verduras  y abarrotes en el mercado de su ciudad y el segundo consiste en la venta de bebidas como gaseosas, refrescos (este negocio lo realiza en la casa de su madre), ella le dedica a su negocio en el mercado alrededor de 4 horas diarias y en el negocio en casa su madre alrededor de 5 horas, Ruth se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio por la dedicación que le da y porque siempre trata a los clientes de manera amable porque ella dice que se trata a los demás como quieres que te traten a ti, en un día puede ganar hasta S/. 30 y en un día muy bueno puede ganar hasta S/.60.

Ruth está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que debido al apoyo brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería (abarrotes) y así tendrá más variedad en su negocio, tendrá mas ingresos y con ello podrá también seguir ahorrando para más adelante cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia para seguridad de su familia”
texts.en:
Ruth Mery is 37 years old and lives in Nazca, Peru. The city is famous for its legendary Nazca Lines, a series of ancient, immense, and inexplicable hieroglyphs engraved in the desert that surrounds the city, generally attributed to the Nazca culture that inhabited the region between 300 and 899 AD. Thus, the city attracts a considerable quantity of tourists. But Nazca is also known for its hard-working people who have preserved their calm despite frequent earthquakes, tsunamis, and a high level of poverty in the region. Ruth lives with her companion and the two work hard in their enterprises.  Together they have 3 children whose ages are 12, 5, and 2 years. Their 12- and 5-year-olds already attend school. The eldest is in the 1st year of secondary school, and the younger is in the 1st year of primary school. The smallest one doesn't attend school as yet but, Ruth tells us he's very active. She loves the three very much and they motivate her every day to get ahead, despite any set backs that may occur.

Ruth is very determined and with much effort and dedication, she operates 2 businesses. The first is selling vegetables and groceries in the city market, and the second is selling drinks such as sodas and soft drinks in her mother's house. Ruth spends about 4 hours a day at her store in the market, and about  5 hours a day at the business in her mother's house. She works hard to get ahead and she believes she is doing well, due to her dedication and because she treats her customers in a kindly manner. She says she always treats others just as she wants them to treat her. In a day, she may earn up to 30 new sols and on a good day she can earn up to 60 new sols.

Ruth is very grateful to Kiva investors, since due to their offers of help, she can buy more groceries to sell, and thus, she will have more variety in her store, and more income. With this, she can continue saving towards her future grand dream: To have her own house for her family's security.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (groceries) for her store in the city market.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es: El señor Faustino vive en la comunidad de espejitos perteneciente al municipio de Porongo,  desde hace mas de 50 años, el  vive solo. El señor Faustino se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería aproximadamente hace 25 años, el siembra maíz, yuca arroz, café y cítricos, así como también tiene ganado vacuno.
